name: Rottweiler

name: Astrumis: Survive Together
description: Astrumis - Survive Together is an exclusively co-op horror game. One player controls a survivor on an abandoned spaceship and the other the ship itself. They must work together to survive against the mysterious monster.

name: Meikyuu Gou Mayoroba
description:
"Mayoroba Labyrinth" is an exploration adventure game where you can freely roam a mysterious labyrinth world, sightseeing and getting lost.

The game features entirely original graphics and background music , and is aimed at players who place importance on production, atmosphere, and image/sound.

It is a walking simulator-like game that focuses on atmosphere, with the main focus being on walking around, looking at the scenery, solving small puzzles, finding hidden passages, and collecting collectible items called "treasures," and there is almost no story.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic On Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Effulgence
description: Explore a mysterious world brought to life through text symbols.

name: Sonic.EXE: The Assault
description: Forgetfulness… Regret… Revenge… When he makes mistakes… what would a father get from his son? What would a son do to calm his sorrow? And what would a ruthless demon commit to feed his rage.. And to calm his hunger? Play the game and resolve the mysteries through a bunch of spooky environments, lots of obstacles, challenging puzzles & an intense terrifying gameplay!

name: Wrong Door
description: This is an abstract, chaotic and meaningless world. A man embarks on a strange adventure in pursuit of absolute power and truth. He becomes the protagonist in the story, a player. In this world, anything is possible. Many things have no explanations. Just accept the present and solve the problems. In this confusing and difficult journey, perhaps something can be understood until the end, or maybe there is still no knowledge or gain, and all the efforts end up in vain. But in any case, one cannot stop here. The road will keep extending. Keep moving forward and fighting. No matter what lies ahead, there is no fear.

name: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix
description: Blockoverse: The Legend of the Pix is an upcoming 2d sidescrolling collect-a-thon platformer. After a group of hammy villains (The Cubies) accidentally unleash an ancient demon named Vertex, a square named Red must harness the powers of 5 archaic spirits, known as the Pix, in order to defeat Vertex. Traverse 5 unique worlds, each sporting their own unique enemies and challenges, on your search to find the 5 Pix, harness their awesome power and bring peace and justice back to the universe.

name: Sonic the Hackable
description: Sin descripción

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 6
description: In Slenderman Must Die: Industrial Waste, you'll navigate terrifying and surreal industrial landscapes as you play a soldier lost in the chaos of war. Immerse yourself in the eerie silence as you work to find 9 vital notes that provide a way out. But beware of the lurking presence, Slenderman. This game combines elements of survival, horror, and first-person shooter gameplay for an unforgettable gaming experience.

name: Shantae and Asha: Dream Fantasia
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic and the Mayhem Master
description:
Sonic and the Mayhem Master is a fanmade RPG game that is based on the Sonic Storybook series. The game offers a new look that fits to the aesthetic of the genre. Explore the world of steampunk, as weird things are about to happen. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

The game was eventually rebranded, losing the ties to Sonic the Hedgehog, retitled as Mekanikko.

name: Sonic Fever
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Regress
description: Sonic Regress is a fangame trying to follow the functionality of the classics of the 16-bit era, with the goal of being another classic Sonic adventure.

name: Informe Ypsilon
description: Sin descripción

name: Kokoro Clover Sun: Prehistoric Invaders!
description: The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series! A visual novel paired with boss battles! Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

name: El Laberinto Esférico
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Storybook Vale
description:
Be whisked away to the Vale and embark on an enchanting adventure with a cast of new characters including the Lorekeeper – a magical book holding this fantastical land together. However, a happily ever after is a ways off as you discover that discordance between two iconic Disney Villains - Maleficent from Disney’s Sleeping Beauty and Hades from Disney’s Hercules, has torn this land apart.

Causing mysterious phenomenon across The Vale’s three biomes – the Bind, Everafter, and Mythopia – their conflict has yielded Ink seeping out of the very ground and sent the pages of the Lorekeeper near and far as enchanted page pieces called Snippets.

name: The Amateur Deity Society
description: An interactive fiction game with a point-and-click interface. Follows the members of an ostensible high-school computer club as they attempt to program a world-simulator.

name: With Sprinkles
description: You play as Vanilla, an ice-cream boy who lives with his best pals Chocolate and Strawberry. Wander around a colorful and fun town while running errands for the big surprise!

name: Bubbleshot
description: You live in someone's immune system. Everyone is happy and go-lucky, until suddenly, a deadly disease attacks the town, and you have to save everyone.

name: Miniplanets
description:
Miniplanets is a homebrew mega drive/genesis game released in (approximately) 2016 by Sik.

Qisha is the protector of the planelago system, a planetary system consisting of five planelagos of nine miniplanets each. Each planelago was guarded by one of Qisha's children, but one day suddenly a mysterious force appeared and cursed them into statues. Qisha must go through all planelagos to retrieve the crystals to save the children and send back the mysterious force back where it belongs.

Guide Qisha through 3D miniplanets in this new and unique platformer for Mega Drive. Jump over obstacles and collect keys with the special twist of paths wrapping around to the other end of the miniplanet.

name: Tae Kwon Dog
description: Tae Kwon Dog is an infinite runner where you must perform combos without touching the ground and prevent the dog from being hit. The goal is to achieve the highest score and compete on the leaderboard.

name: Magic Cat Academy 3
description: Help Momo the Cat battle ghostly opponents across the atmosphere.

name: Indiana Jones and The Relic of the Viking
description: This free game is a point-n-click adventure game in the style of classic 90's pixel-art games. It takes about 3 hours to complete.

name: Pac-Man SuperFast!
description: Pac-Man SuperFast! is a remake of the original Pac-Man for YouTube Playables.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 7
description:
Slenderman Must Die: Abandoned Graveyard is another amazing installment from the sinister and creepy Slenderman Must Die series.

Find it and Burn Slendermans body + Halloween Special

In Halloween Special - Explore the big city and find 9 green pumpkins.

The game was initially released as a standalone program and Android application in October 2017. The WebGL version was released in March 2018 and has been updated with a new version in March 2019.

name: Terminal North
description:
Explore the Global Seed Bank as the official delegate from the United States Office of Disaster Preparedness.

All you have to do is deposit a few boxes of seeds.

You’re alone, cold, and in the dark, but the man on the other side of the terminal will help guide you.

Ignore the logs.

description: Sin descripción

description: Fazbear in After is a non-horror FNaF fan game action platformer that has RPG elements, a combat game inspired by Sonic stuff about the Fazbear family saving the world from destruction.

name: The Experiment
description: Sin descripción

name: Circus of Death
description: Circus of Death is an interactive horror mystery game. “CIRCUS OF DEATH" is YOUR story. Because your decisions not only affect the course of the game, but also the end of this horror game.

name: Sonic Super Jam

name: Delved

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8
description:
In the episode titled From Burn To Return (Hell Fire), Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 8, demons take over the town and kidnap everyone. A horror game.

In this chapter, Slenderman has gained the power of fire, making him more dangerous than ever before, and the only man who can stop him is the town's brave firefighter.

As the player, you must save the town from this fiery nightmare.

name: Sonic: Scrambled Eggs
description: Sin descripción

name: Quotle
description: Quotle is a daily film quote guessing game. Your goal is to guess the film from the famous quote. Each time you make a guess you will get additional information about the film, the genres, the release year, who said the line, and the director of the film. You can leave the guess blank to skip forward to new clues

name: Sonic Speed Course
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sonic Speed Course
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinpoint
description:
Guess the category.

There are 5 clues hidden on the board. All 5 clues belong to a common category. Your objective is to guess the category in as few clue reveals as possible. Each incorrect guess you make will reveal the next clue.

name: Leshy Prelude
description: A horror action-adventure with a gripping story. Fight through the forest using energy granted to you by greater powers lest you succumb to the will of the forest guardian Leshy.

name: Crossclimb
description:
Unlock a trivia ladder.

Guess the answer to each clue. Reorder the rows to form a word ladder, where each word differs by one letter. Finish the top and bottom rows after they are unlocked to complete the puzzle.

name: Woogles
description: Woogles is an online word puzzle service that lets people of all skill levels from all over the world improve at Scrabble

name: Neurokino Retrograde
description: A melancholic/esoteric sci-fi visual novel; reconnect with a being that (you hope...?) might be your missing/returned ex-girlfriend.

name: Tango
description:
Harmonize the grid.

The goal of the puzzle is to fill the grid with sun and moon icons. No more than 2 of either symbol may be next to each other. Each row and column must contain the same number of symbols. Cells separated by an = sign must be of the same type, while cells separated by an X sign must be of the opposite type.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Survivors
description: Slenderman Must Die: Survivors is a survival shooter game that allows you to switch between third-person and first-person camera views. Choose from five different characters and confront waves of weird creatures coming at you from all directions.

name: Six Textures #3
description: 17 maps done with the main rule: *6 textures only* including the sky, but not including utility textures (trigger/clip/skip, etc.) or liquids

name: Pick Me Pick Me
description: "Pick Me Pick Me" is an innovative 2-player online game that brings the chaos and hilarity of dating to the virtual world. Step into the Battlefield of Love, where you'll compete to use your creative ideas to have an engaging conversation with different characters powered by AI, showing your stylish outfits and taste, and placing strategic skill cards to win over your virtual partner and outshine your opponent.

name: Exhibit of Sorrows
description:
Not all is well in the Exhibit of Sorrows. Move through this progressively creepy exhibition and check out the strange dolls on display. Interact with the dolls to reveal the keys. Be prepared to do terrible things to escape.

The mood gets darker and more unsettling as you progress. You will encounter the same exhibitions in disturbing new forms as you become increasingly more panicked to escape. You will have to make cruel decisions in order to leave.

Regardless of the sinister undertone to the game, there is a story to learn that will keep you gripped to the end. Exhibit of Sorrows is an excellent horror game worth seeing through.

name: The Death of Fo-gu
description: The Death of Fo-gu is a short adventure game made for the 2024 $108 Adventure Game Challenge whose theme was: The Dunning-Kruger Effect.

name: Great Bishi Bashi Champ
description: A game that features 142 mini-games that are generated at random when you choose between modes. It has an interactive difficulty system, in which the difficulty changes depending on how many games you passed/failed in a row. Because of that, the difficulty between stages becomes increasingly more challenging. Each stage ends with a "boss battle". After the game, a score table will show up, comparing your score to the target score. If it matches, or is better than the target score, you will get rise in rank, which is shown at the bottom of the screen, and will not lose a life. If it is worse, a crowd booing sound will be heard, and you will lose a life.

name: It Takes Two to Tangle
description: It Takes Two to Tangle is a 2024 King's Quest fan game release. It is an unofficial follow-up to King's Quest VIII and continues the story of Queen Cassima, wife of King Alexander and Prince Edgar, lover of Princess Rosella on a long, perplexing journey which will ultimately decide the fate of both themselves and their loved ones.

name: Central Standard
description: Central Standard is a short adventure game made for the 2024 $108 Adventure Challenge about a cook starting an apprenticeship at the hot new restaurant: Central Standard!

name: Sesari 1
description: Sesari 1 is the first part in a haunted science-fiction point-and-click adventure game series about two women suddenly and completely losing their memory at a gas station in the middle of the desert,

name: Rise of the Pawn
description: Rise of the Pawn is a chess and poker hybrid strategy game.

name: El Ladrón del Tiempo
description: Sin descripción

name: PUBG: Blindspot
description: PUBG: BLINDSPOT is a dynamic 5v5 military shooting game, presenting a realistic and fast-paced gunplay like never before in a top-down shooting game. Use real-time shared vision with teammates and a variety of tools to create and execute creative team strategies.

name: Redline
description: High octane zero gravity racing! Race around a gravity defying track at over 1000 kph using precision two joystick steering. Race in your opponent's redline to build limit-breaking boosts. Race on your own, or with friends in up to 4 player split screen.

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl
description:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.
Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.
Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange in the Whimsical Library
description: The Capybaras with Orange are back! Find them all in the fantastic library. Search for them between books and on the stained glass windows. Light them up at night with amazing colors.

name: TAGAP 4
description:
During his adventures, the cyber-penguin Pablo has saved the world multiple times – from a world-conquering mad scientist, a megalomaniac penguin general and a whole race of space penguins from Pluto. However, an event during his previous adventure has thrown our hero out of this world. Out of this time.
What if Pablo wasn't there to save the world? What if the mad scientist Glowenko wasn't stopped in his tracks, but now rules the world with a rubber glove?
Stuck in an alternate timeline, Pablo has to find a way home while fighting the whole world gone mad.

name: Wheel of Fortune Daily
description: Sin descripción

name: Drive Ahead! Carcade
description:
In Drive Ahead! Carcade, you win by knocking your opponents on the head in cars with just one hit, it’s that simple!

Experience a brand new evolution of the Drive Ahead! world, filled with real time multiplayer chaos and crazy unforgettable moments where anything can happen.

name: Chainsaw Juice King
description: Fruit hunting meets an idle tycoon adventure. Equip your chainsaw, hunt quirky live fruits, and turn them into delicious juice to grow your juice empire.

name: Finn Dorset's Institute For Livestock Replication
description: An animated incremental game about cloning livestock. Make as many moon sheep as you can. Research technology, upgrade your operation and become a clone farm billionaire!

name: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time
description: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time is a strategic card game where players harness iconic characters, creatures, and the mystical forces of the One Power from the legendary fantasy world. Build decks, master unique abilities, and outplay opponents in dynamic, lore-rich battles.

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - The Windman's Land
description:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.
Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.
Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

JUMP, GLIDE AND SOAR TO EXPLORE!
Raanaa's shamanistic powers and magic dress allows her to jump higher & further, glide and even soar through the air! In the spirit worlds the islands, trees and even mountains are floating in the air, these skills become very handy!

SEEK, FIND AND COLLECT!
To proceed in the game, Raanaa has to activate the powerful Sieidi stones by collecting enough colourful spirit essence. But there are more things to be found in the spirit worlds. Hidden objects and animals, not to mention plenty of tokens! So many in fact that it raises a question: what will happen if you collect them all?

name: Cubio
description: Cubio is a user‑friendly, code‑free sandbox platform built on a creator‑first philosophy, designed to respect and reward creators

name: Gor Lab
description:
This game is based on survival. Set in a zombie engulfed laboratory.
Gor Lab is a fast-paced action game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

Players will find it stressed fighting the zombies while waiting for external help. With untamed calling and waiting for the arrival of backup personnel.
It becomes just a will to survive, saving the day, one day at a time.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Chemical Combat Gear Set
description: Withstand challenging environments and conquer the battlefield with the Chemical Combat Gear Set for the Security team. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Protective Gear Set
description: Gear up for chemical warfare and gain the upper hand over your opponents with the Protective Gear Set for Insurgents. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set
description: Show your knowledge of the battlegrounds with the Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Dusty Weapon Skin Set
description: Give your arsenal an authentic feel and blend into the desert sands with the Dusty Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Into the Emberlands: Supporter Pack
description:
For all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developers of Into the Emberlands, the supporter pack offers a collection of bonus content.
Three skins for the Lightbearer: The Stubborn, The Determined, The Fanatic
A mysterious pet: The flying Platypus
The original soundtrack: Brighten your mood with the nine wholesome tracks of Into the Emberlands
The digital Artbook

name: The Mystery of the Art School
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings
description: Recruit and command a party of samurai on expeditions into the Shadowlands of the Legend of the Five Rings universe. Gain experience and cards in battle to develop units and create powerful combat combinations in this strategic roguelite.

name: Mole Mine Rocks 0.15
description: Mole Mine Rocks is a clicker game where you manage a mole mining operation. Mine rocks, gather resources, upgrade your abilities, and explore levels. Hire moles for passive income, fix leaks, and interact with dynamic dialogue. Enjoy cutscenes and strategic planning to become a mine manager.

name: Slenderman History: WWII Faceless Horror
description: In Slenderman History: WWII Faceless Horror, you're plunged into a sinister World War II environment, where the Nazis are conducting nefarious experiments. The aim? Creating a super soldier and summoning Slenderman through the use of an ancient artifact.

name: Pit of Goblin
description: In this online horror co-op, you play as a scrappy goblin, scavenging dungeons, dodging traps, and fleeing monsters to feed the Goblin King. Team up with goblin pals, or go rogue, as you dive deep and cause chaos! Fail to feed him, and you might be the next meal!

name: Recontact Istanbul: Eyes Of Sky
description: Sin descripción

name: Kill The Music
description: Auto-Attack to the Beat of the Music and Hit Rhythm Inputs to boost your Damage! Build up your Solo Meter to trigger beautiful animations and cascading effects to mow down hordes of enemies!

name: El Narco
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Look along Woodward Boulevard
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. 2 Deluxe
description: A full ROM hack for Super Mario World where you return to the world of Sub-Con to rescue the subcons and the princess from Bowser! All the graphics and levels have been changed and the game looks a lot like the original Super Mario Bros.2 title but with enhancements.

name: Jantei Monogatari 3: Saver Angels
description:
The events of Saver Angels take place after those described in the previous installment of the series, when peace on Earth has already been restored thanks to the efforts of Divan and Marie. Three cosmic spirits have lost their way in space and have to descend onto Earth, taking corporeal form. They enter the bodies of three young women who died recently: one in a traffic accident, another from disease, and the third one - a ten-year-old girl - after committing suicide. All three were avid mahjong players, and all three are now revived and endowed with mysterious mahjong powers. A special Mahjong Academy opens, and the Saver Angels (as the group begins calling itself) is ready to defeat any aliens and demons in that ancient Chinese game.

Saver Angels restores adventure elements that were absent from the previous game, and even enhances them. The player is now able to move in first-person perspective by pointing and clicking on a spot on the screen. Exploring locations, the player triggers scenes, which in turn lead to mahjong games. A special "mahjong mode" allows the player to choose an opponent from the story mode and challenge her (or him) to a mahjong match right away.

name: Nonolith
description: Discover the countless secrets of the NONOLITH. Copy and paste blocks to reach new areas, and master hidden mechanics that let you do the seemingly impossible. You are very powerful, you just don't know it yet.

name: A Little to the Left: Trick or Tidy
description: Five ghoulish new puzzles inbound for the season of scares.

name: Choko Loco 2
description: A fairly linear action adventure game where you collect spam, extra lives and fight lovecraftian monsters. There is some exploration but it's more of an action game. I consider it of the "psychological horror" genre. It is also a 3d platformer, like Mario 64 but insanely twisted. You can also swim underwater, and you will have to to finish the game. There are other environmental hazards such as mud and slime.

name: The Hundredth Hike
description: The Hundredth Hike is an Indie Psychological Horror game, living the story of you, as a mountain hiker, reliving your tragic past and finding the calm of the nature under your boots. Unaware of what lies before you, you unleash a powerful and mysterious truth.

name: Cube Farm
description: A simple semi-idle farming game on mobile.

name: Jeff The Killer: Slendermans Betrayal
description:
When two dreaded horror villains start kill-stealing from each other, all hell breaks loose and a bloody showdown begins in Jeff the Killer: Slendermans Betrayal!

This ultimate battle between two blood-chilling myths is set in a spooky urban environment, and there are a total of 14 levels to complete.

name: Little Big Planet 3: Dark Souls 3 Costume pack
description: Reach the pinnacle of fashion-souls by dressing Sackboy and Sackgirl as characters from iconic RPG adventure, Dark Souls III.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Bigfoot Costume
description:
Follow the monster-sized footprints.
Campers beware, deep in the forest lurks a very big hairy beast indeed − luckily it’s really Toggle dressed up as Bigfoot, as the cheeky scamp.

name: LittleBigPlanet: 3 Dia de Muertos Big Toggle Costume
description: October 31st marks the start of the Mexican national holiday celebrating those who have passed. Dress Big Toggle up in this mariachi costume and join in with this tradition filled three day fiesta and welcome the souls of the departed.

name: LittleBigPlanet: Sack-Eating Plant Costume
description: The best thing about Sackboy is that you can make him look and act exactly how you want. Download this additional costume to really stand out from the crowd!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Little Nightmares Creator-Pack
description: Build scary adventures in an oversized fantasy world with this fun-packed Level Creator Kit.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Plants vs. Zombies Zombie Costume
description: Oh no - Sackboy has turned into a zombie! Don’t worry it’s just a costume. Dress him up and shuffle through a garden warfare adventure.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Cyberman Costume
description:
Sackboy has undergone a cyber-conversion with this metallic costume based on one of the Doctor’s most feared enemies – the Cybermen.

Ever since the First Doctor originally encountered them in Antarctica, this silver nemesis has used all kinds of cyber-creatures to thwart his time-travelling adventures including Cybermats and Cybermites, but never a CyberSack – until now…

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Tekken 7 Yoshimitsu Costume
description: Break all the rules with this wacky space ninja costume featuring the leader of the Manji Clan – Yoshimitsu from Tekken 7.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Cupid Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Beta Reward Vest Costume
description: The best thing about Sackboy is that you can make him look and act exactly how you want. Download this additional costume to really stand out from the crowd!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Autumn Seasonal Creator Kit
description: Get your Autumn Seasonal creator kit today!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda AI Armor Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Turkey Head Costume
description: The best thing about Sackboy is that you can make him look and act exactly how you want. Download this additional costume to really stand out from the crowd!

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Winter Seasonal Creator Kit
description: Add new decorations and stickers to your LittleBigPlanet 3 experience with the Winter Seasonal Creator Kit. Download it today. Available for a limited time only.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda Poc Costume
description:
Wondering what your enemies are up to?
Are you annoyed that they’re hiding behind big walls, probably plotting your downfall?
Don’t worry, just kit your winged wonder-bird Swoop out in this drone costume from Mass Effect: Andromeda, and watch him soar to gather all the intel you need.

name: Pinball M: Camp Bloodbrook
description: Sin descripción

name: Starlair
description: Fly through an endless universe visiting the planets of other users and taking on their challenges in a Metroidvania style game!

name: Find the Cat
description:
Welcome to "Find The Cat", a fun hidden object puzzle game where your mission is to find cats hidden in black and white backgrounds. Simply tap on the cats to reach your goal and advance to the next level.

As you progress through the levels, you'll discover new and exciting places around the world. Each level brings a fresh challenge, keeping the gameplay engaging and enjoyable. There's also a daily mode where you can search for more hidden cats in vibrant, colorful backgrounds.

New levels, scenes, and challenges are added regularly, ensuring that there is always something new to explore. You'll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to find cats in the most unexpected places. "Find The Cat" is designed for all ages, offering endless fun and adventure for everyone.

Download "Find The Cat" now and start your cat-finding journey. Can you find all the hidden cats?

name: Flagaroo
description:
Get it right and discover new flags!
Enjoy playing Flagaroo and test your knowledge of world flags!

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 04
description: Full 32 map megawad of autumn/fall goodness brought to you by the fine folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone discord. Expect a lot of black and orange, healthy mix of natural, gothic and techbase environments, and a approachable difficulty for the most part.

name: Wayward Puritans
description: Wayward Puritans is a spooky, survival horror-inspired single level for the Doom 2 IWAD, with an ending map in MAP02. Explore a creepy mansion, uncover the secrets of an ancient cult, and fight for your sanity against forces more terrible than social science can theorize! Taking inspiration from Resident Evil 1 and cosmic horror, combat has been extensively retooled, so be prepared to make due with more meager resources than your usual Doom map.

name: Muv-Luv Supplement
description: Muv-Luv Supplement is a fan disc of Muv-Luv and contains various things, like an after story of Muv-Luv Extra; a series of short stories focusing around one of the main heroines; and Muv-Luv Duelist, which is a trading card game.

name: The Booze of Monkey Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Ved: Recure
description: Ved: Recure is a fast-paced action roguelite where you play as an adult trapped in the 1000th game you bought but never played. You’ll wield fully customizable buff chains to face off against formidable foes and strategic builds to conquer this 1000th game and make your way back to reality.

name: Peaks of Yore: The Great Alps
description: Take the Alpine Express and travel to the picturesque Einvald Valley to conquer the Great Alps' collection of crags, boulders, mountains, and more.

name: Combine 2 Pumpkins
description: Combine 2 similar pumpkins into a new larger one! Use special pumpkins to achieve crazy combos and compete for the highest score!

name: Prison Princess: Trapped Allure
description: At long last a completely new sequel to Prison Princess, the mystery-solving adventure game where you guide princesses to escape the clutches of the Demon King!

name: Samurai of Hyuga Book 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Mappy Atari
description: Bootleg port of the classic Namco game.

name: Pope-ye
description: Bootleg port of the classic Nintendo game

name: Teletubbies Mercy Killing
description: Sin descripción

name: Grounded Sim
description: In this comical adventure, you embody Giles Outlandish, who drunkenly stumbles into a portal, mistaking it for an exit from a bar. Now trapped in Kayloo's Games, you must conquer diverse levels of various game genres to escape. However, the key to success lies in entertaining the mischievous creatures and avoiding the wrath of the monsters. With simple humor and clever thinking, players must navigate this whimsical realm to find a way back home before they become trapped forever.

name: Necromantic Thirst
description: Necromantic Thirst is a Boom compatible (-complevel 9) 32-map megawad developed by the French Doom Community (and friends), inspired by some well-known classic wads of yesteryear, and featuring a new take on the standard progression : classic UAC techbases slowly but surely blend into a new, twisted, green and black hellish world. Beware of the evil spirit that inhabits these industrial and medieval worlds, or you might end up losing your sanity.

name: Days Gone: Challenge Mode
description: Challenge Mode is a post-launch addition that introduced tweleve challenges focused on combat, survival, and bike skills. Each challenge has unique objectives, requiring players to fend off waves of Freakers, defeat human enemies, or complete bike stunts within specific constraints. Completing challenges awards players with patches, rings, and other rewards that grant gameplay boosts, which can be used in both the Challenge Mode and the main game.

name: Office Chair Curling
description: in this game you throw office chairs at a target

name: Bwirds
description:
A whimsical word game!

Writers are lost for words and need your help spelling new ones. The chef needs spicy words for his cook book. The artist needs colorful language and the naturalist needs wild animal words. Use your grabber contraption to nab bwirds out of the sky to form words and reap the rewards as long as you keep your writers happy.

name: Devils on the Moon Pinball
description: Themed on the astrologically Occult, Devils on the Moon is a Single board VG-Pinball Heavily inspired by all the great Pinball games of the past and some modern ones as well.

name: Curvelicious
description: A fast-paced, competitive multiplayer curve game where up to 8 players battle in local matches. Customize your gameplay with dozens of power-ups and game modes, from classic no-powerup duels to chaotic arcade challenges. Master your curve and outlast your opponents! Gamepad supported.

name: The End of an Obsession
description:
You feel groggy when you finally wake up.

The back of your head is throbbing and your mouth feels dry, as though it has been stuffed full of wool.

With bleary eyes, you glance about.

What time is it?

Where are you…

And, perhaps more importantly, who are you?

Try though you might, you can’t remember.

This could very well be your end — but wait. Who is that woman standing by your bedside, who looks like a rose?

Perhaps she can help you.

Now, why don’t you open your heart up to her?

Learn how to love her, and perhaps this story might even have a happy ending.

name: Ding Dong Die
description: Sin descripción

name: Laser Limbo
description: Laser Limbo is an AR battle game compilation. It transforms homes, offices, or entire floors into unique AR multiplayer arenas that make perfect use of every square meter of space as they wrap around any obstacle.

name: Soccer World
description: Master your goalkeeping skills with Soccer World—your ultimate training tool! Whether you're aiming to improve or complement your outdoor practice, our immersive VR game brings pro-level training right to your headset.

name: Beer Pong Basement
description: Experience the classic party game of beer pong in virtual reality! Challenge a friend or practice your skills against a training robot. Play regular beer pong or add some excitement and change things up with an arrangement of items and power-ups. Watch the entire Youtube library, either by yourself or together with friends. Beer Pong Basement has more to offer than beer pong though. Try your luck at the slot machine or the Flappy Cuppy arcade machine to earn credits. Or try to unlock the many different ping pong balls this game has to offer. Bring the party to your headset with Beer Pong Basement!

name: Caillou Bowling
description: We are glad to present you a brand new game of Caillou. At the game of Caillou Bowling you have 10 shots to get the most points and finish the game successfully. Click on your mouse to stop the arrow in front of the pins and mark the position of the ball. After you mark the position of the ball left-click on your mouse and set the desired strength on the strength bar.

name: Now Entering: Quiet Haven
description: Sin descripción

name: Shotgun II: Double Barrel
description: Shotgun II: Double Barrel is the second installment of the SHOTGUN series and while not all the changes are present in this teaser, the way the game is played will have some cool tweaks worked in, plus cutscenes and a more in depth story!

name: The Punch Drunk Monk
description: Your temple has been raided by a bloodthirsty gang and one monk has had enough! Play as Punch Drunk Monk and make your way back to your desecrated temple for a showdown with the leader! There are many different hazards throughout your quest for vengeance, as well as dangerous foes such as deadly warriors, evil sorcerers, and enraged spirits!

name: Modercai Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: Symphony Of Motion
description: Symphony Of Motion offers a new unique way to create and experience music without the need for any prior musical knowledge. Whether you're a seasoned musician or a complete beginner, this is a new and intuitive way to create and experience music. In its simplest form, you just move your hands around to create unique sounds, melodies, and rhythms. There are no “wrong” notes to worry about (as you always play in a specific scale) and you can always stay on perfect tempo with the build-in perfect timing assistant. For the more experienced musicians, it also offers a lot of customization options, a build-in looper, and new levels of expressional depth with its three-dimensional motion modulation, live pitch-shifting drums, and melodic pads.

name: George Lopez: Lawn Art Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: Skibidi Sandbox
description: Skibidi Sandbox is a sandbox game where you can have lots of fun. This includes spawning items such as Skibidi Toilet so you can shoot it or you can blow it up by spawning in rockets. Skibidi Sandbox is the perfect game to have some action. There are also two maps you can explore and have some fun shooting/blowing things up and finding secrets. This is the perfect game for you if you want to have some skibidi fun.

name: El Niño Rata
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultima Online: Outlands
description:
Join us in launching the most anticipated Ultima Online server! UO Outlands is a free-to-play shard set in the T2A era with over 3 years of development.

Be among the first to form a guild, place a house, conquer a dungeon, kill one of your fellow adventurers, or master a skill. There is nothing quite like the rush of logging in with hundreds of other players for the first time, all on equal footing.

Outlands features auto-account creation, so simply download our installer, pick your assistant of choice (Razor or Steam) and login! Because Outlands is a highly customized gaming world featuring a brand new map, new monsters, new clothing items, custom hues and more, we have made the installation process as easy as possible.

name: Accolade Sports Collection
description:
Accolade Sports Collection is a retro collection featuring some of the most iconic sports games from the early 90s. This collection includes titles like Summer Challenge, Winter Challenge, Hardball 1&2 and Hoops Shut Up and Jam!.

This collection offers a complete retro gaming experience, where players can easily select from the different titles available, with features like save states, filters options, manuals and more!

name: Dawn of Fear
description: Experience an intense survival horror journey as an investigative agent in a dark and cursed village. The quest for a leader has never been so hindered.

name: Blades & Battles
description: Blades & Battles is a fantasy Beat'Em Up game that takes players to the heart of the legendary world of King Arthur in his barbarian youth. A modern version of classic titles such as Golden Axe.

name: Itsutsu no Neito+
description: Sin descripción

name: Nazoritas Addictive Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bird Simulator 24
description: Take flight in Bird Simulator 24, an outrageous action game where you reclaim your rightful territory from the humans and assert your genetic dominance! As a fearless bird, your mission is simple: rule the skies, reclaim your homeland, and fight the humans in the most hilarious ways imaginable.

name: Tales of the Uncanny
description: A horror game featuring standalone stories filled with eerie atmospheres and unsettling mysteries. Each chapter reveals a new, chilling narrative where your choices shape the outcomes. Dive into the unknown and embrace the uncanny.

name: Course of Temptation
description:
Course of Temptation is a detailed adult college life simulator. It’s text-based and runs right in your browser.

Featuring a detailed simulation with hundreds of possible events and erotic scenes, you can explore your exhibitionist, voyeuristic, and debauched fantasies through your character.

A detailed life simulator! Manage your character’s day-to-day needs, skills, attitudes, clothes, and so on. A different story every day! Make plans as you like. Go to class. See a movie. Work out at the gym. Make some questionable side bets at the arcade. But expect surprises.

Hundreds of events mean you can never be sure exactly what will happen. An erotic narrative. Long-term plotlines with recurring characters will play out over time, including erotic prose that’s reactive to your character and your decisions.

name: Path to Nowhere: Glitchwave Nihil
Crater Song
description: Crater Song is a single-player co-op puzzle-adventure game with an authentic 8-bit aesthetic that takes place on the alien world of Orebody. Two twins, born of song, must embark on a mythic journey to lift a curse that makes them the target of eldritch horrors from beyond the stars.

name: Sunset Land
description: Our story takes place on Venture, a planet that has recently been colonized by several corporations to harvest its valuable resources. You play as a psychic named Marco, who is tasked with stealing 3 stellar crystals (artifacts which contain tremendous amounts of energy) for an intergalactic mob boss.

name: Moida Mansion
description: Oh no! The Adventure Club's official mascot turtle has carelessly wandered into Moida Mansion. Your friends went after her and got trapped! They broke the golden T.A.C. rule: "Stay out of Moida Mansion." Now it's up to you. Sneak in and rescue them before it's too late!

name: Venge 2.0
description: Sin descripción

name: Corporeal
description: A paranormal mystery where you piece together a haunted family photo album. As the sole survivor of unexplained events in the 1990s, search for answers in an archive of photos rescued from the ruins of your childhood home, manipulate the past, encounter specters & map your cursed family history.

name: Jeff The Killer vs. Slendrina
description:
Jeff the Killer vs. Slendrina brings together two evil and dastardly villains in an epic third person shooter battle. You can play as either Jeff the killer or the fearesome and twisted Slendrina.

Move around the map and find the different hidden objects as you play. You must battle it out against the other iconic character but also fight against the various monsters and creatures that you encounter. Who will win the ultimate battle of evil?

name: Realm of Chaos 2
description: On October 31st, 1996, The Macintosh Team released Realm of Chaos, the first Mac-made megawad. Now, in a rare opportunity, 2 of the original mappers, Steve Duff and Rob Berkowitz, and his son, Leo Berahovich, along with a team of veterans and fans of RoC, have combined to create Realm of Chaos 2: The Revenge of '96! The style of this megawad is oldschool with occasional fashion-forward maps. The mix is eclectic, similar to the original RoC, with broadly defined episode themes. Difficulty ranges from mild to challenging, especially in the episode-ending maps.

name: Valkyrie Destruction
description: Explore a classic JRPG world together with a cute battle maiden! Upon being rescued from a monster by a passing battle maiden, the protagonist Batz begins journeying together with her. But taking advantage of her weakness, the scoundrel Batz has other plans for his beautiful savior.

name: Domino Earning World
description:
It is the first platform for this game, based on blockchain that unites millions of domino enthusiasts in a community where they will be able to buy and create their own NFTs such as avatars and accessories.

In addition, they will be able to organize games including tournaments in gaming centers. DEW will combine multi-million dollar video game-based marketplaces and a popularized millennial game, all merged by blockchain and NFT technologies.

There are not many video games that offer players the opportunity to generate real profits. We believe there is a huge opportunity in the video game market with “play to win” features.

This is skill-based gaming with the potential for real-world monetary rewards. The slow digitization and lack of transparency of the NFT gaming market, gave us the ability to see the great niche for the creation of Dominoes as NFT.

Online domino game platforms with modern graphics, extensive gameplay possibilities and, most importantly, blockchain is what the market wants.

name: Taiyaki Fabulous Museum of Fish
description: Welcome to Fishcross Island! Explore the land and water, meet weird characters, and solve nonogram puzzles for items and progress. Will you gain the Power of 7 Fish and meet Chad face-to-face in the Taiyaki Fabulous Museum of Fish?

name: Holy Undead
description: An undead-loving necromancer is reincarnated as a saint!? By chance, the necromancer Frankel is reborn as Yurishia, a girl with the incredible qualities of a saint. Today, too, she ignores the expectations of those around her and forges ahead on her path to collecting undead.

name: Isekai-ya
description: An adorable cooking game where you hop around many worlds, finding new ingredients to whip up new recipes. Get to meet a variety of customers of all races and background as you immerse yourself in the flow and frenzy of running a restaurant.

name: Mint Fantome's Freak or Treat
description: Join Mint and her friends on a spooky-fun Halloween adventure! Trick or treat through eerie but charming neighbourhoods, discovering candies, coins, and cute characters in every level. Use her Halloween costume powers to overcome obstacles and explore hidden areas. Can you help Mint collect every treat and meet all of her friends?

name: Puio Puio
description: A parody of a flagship of COMPILE's dropping puzzle games. Made as part of a "one game a day challenge".

name: Spirit Driver
description: From the everyday passenger to the horrors of Halloween, Spirit Driver is a short, casual conversation simulator where your choices can affect the fates of people and spirits alike. Remember, your choices have consequences. Good luck!

name: Love Me or Die
description: Yuki, a lonely teenager, embarks on a desperate quest for popularity and fame. But her path soon turns into a dark and tragic journey that will change her life forever. A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries.

name: El Padrastro
description: Sin descripción

name: Gummibär Mobile Game
description: Sin descripción

name: While We Sleep: Slendrina Is Here
description: While We Sleep: Slendrina Is Here is the first person horror game in which you must find keys and fight evil beings. While most of are sleeping there are others fighting to keep us all safe. Slendrina is coming and you need to defeat the evil spirit for the safety of the world.

name: Aerial Guard
description: Sin descripción

name: Astral Blitz
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamit: The Skyward Voyage
description:
An incredible voyage about the disheveled old man, Gamit, and his crusade to annihilate a sky-born nation.

Plucked from the crust of the earth, the elite of the world decided to break free from the surface. Leaving the surface drought with pollution and disarray. However, there is one, misguided-idiotic-unwashed man, ready to take them down.

Gamit plays as a top-down shooter, pick from 12 varied weapons before you pick a mission to take down. Fight varied enemies in different levels through-out 4 worlds. Tackle goals with a variety of options, fight bosses with varied patterns and counters, and help Gamit destroy the new sky nation.

name: Hellslave: Project Z-Treme
description: Sin descripción

name: Hover Warz
description: Sin descripción

name: JellyBall
description:
Jellyball is a physics platformer where you control a squishy slime!

JellyBall takes after the game Gish, where you play as a simulated blob that can change forms.

name: ChronoVenture
description:
ChronoVenture is a momentum-based Gameboy-style platformer shooter where the player controls a cat named Lizzy as she runs, jumps, claws and shoots her way to the end of the level where she'll encounter against a boss to unlock a new weapon or ability before she finds herself warping into the future.

Taking inspiration from Sonic CD, you start off in Act 1 during the present or past of a stage where you can either focus on completing an objective that changes the future in Act 2 for the better or reach to the end as fast as you can for a tougher challenge.

name: Let's Fly Away
description: Let's Fly Away is a shoot em' up (shmup) which aims to make the game accessible to anyone with its easy, flowing gameplay, with layers of depth for advanced players to toy around with the massive amount of customization for a different experience each play through. The game is also built around a story unlike most shmups, telling a different tale with each of it's main characters.

name: Lady Killers
description: You play as a futuristic ninja girl named Ashe who joins a female mercenary group called Lady Killers. In this game you'll be fighting robots, monsters, and other PMC groups as you progress through missions and fight powerful enemies.

name: Horror High
description:
HORROR HIGH is a '90s horror/comedy 4v1, competitive survival, open-map RPG.
Up to four high school stereotypes face iconic monsters as they attempt to survive and escape.

Journey around the expansive town of Creepertin as you gave weapons, health, flashlights, and key items you'll need to rebuild long-abandoned vehicles and flee to safety. Or, team up and try to take down your pursuer!

name: Linja vs. the Maneclowns
description: Linja vs. the Maneclowns is wacky 2D action platformer focused on speed and mobility.

name: Dahlia
description:
Dahlia is a very short sapphic visual novel made in under 36 hours for the Velox Formido game jam, a jam for shortform visual novels. survive being trapped with a lovely little vampire, or don't.

This game is 2.3k words long and has 3 endings. It's playable in English and French.

name: Marble Launcher
description: Journey through the world of Marble Launcher. Explore interesting worlds and overcome challenges in a 2D platforming adventure.

name: The Headmaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Baldi's Basics The Ancient Save
description: This game offers a rich storyline, building on the classic Baldi's Basics experience. Players are drawn into a deeper mystery, facing new challenges and unexpected twists. With added characters, puzzles, and secrets, it expands the universe with a thrilling and engaging plot.

name: Meander Forth
description: Meander Forth is a game about a small town that gets rocked by the resurgence of a strange, magical force that causes all sorts of supernatural phenomenon

name: Meander Forth: Teak's Tall Tale
description: When aspiring punk-rock drummer Oscar Teak is kicked out of his favorite band, he mopes his way home. He doesn't get far before he learns some chilling news, however: His childhood friend Tamree Willow is missing! The bearer of this news, a child in a wooden mask, demands that Teak follow her into the woods. Does she really know the whereabouts of the misplaced Ms. Willow? That's for you to find out.

name: Meander Forth: Teak's Tall Tale Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Meander Forth: Teak's Tall Tale Plus Plus
description:
One year after the original Teak's Tall Tale was released, an "enhanced version" with nicer backgrounds, new dialog, and a short demo of the actual Meander Forth was released. to coincide with the Sonic Amateur Games Expo 2020. This version was called "Teak's Tall Tale Plus."

Unfortunately, the Plus version had some HUGE technical oversights during development that caused it to barely run on machines running Windows 10, on top of being a technical mess regardless.

The 2021 version, Teak's Tall Tale Plus Plus, was compiled in GameMaker Studio 2, mitigating some of the technical issues. On top of that, certain visual effects have been redone for optimization. Certain art assets have been replaced, as well. I hope this version's release is a lot more smooth than it was last time!

name: Diamond Sword, Wooden Sword
description: The game is set in the fantasy universe of Nick Perumov's literary saga of the same name. Humans, after defeating the dwarves, elves and orcs, founded the Empire, which is ruled by seven Magical Orders. However, the future of the state is in jeopardy. Deep in the Drung Forest, the sacred wooden sword Immelstorn has awakened, and in the caves of the Foothill Tribe, the diamond Dragnir - artifacts with destructive power. At the center of the battle for the iconic blades is the protagonist Fess, a mercenary of the Grey League. He will have to demonstrate his strength, agility, and magical abilities to find the swords and save the world, thus disproving the ancient prophecy about the end of time.

name: Slenderclown: Be Afraid of It!
description:
Slender Clown: Be Afraid of It! sees a return of the weird and mystical Slenderman character. In this episode, Slenderman has disguised himself as a creepy clown. He is also accompanied by an army of evil clowns that he has summoned from the depths of darkness.

You must complete two different missions and try to defeat Slender Clown and his minions. Each mission takes place in a spooky location – either an abandoned carnival or abandoned building. You must try and collect the different colored balloons and then use different weapons at your disposal to eliminate the clown creatures!

name: Corpse Carnival
description:
Explore the carnival with your friends! Your little sister is there to tag along as well. Why not play some games, interact with the patrons and have some fun?

...As long as you're home by nightfall...

name: MegaMan Star Force EndWave
description: Sin descripción

name: Softie
description: Softie is a short creepy (but cute!) point-and-click adventure game. Take on the role of a cuddly teddy bear trying to find their lost owner in a peculiar house.

name: The Uzujigoku Massacre
description:
Takiyo Mochizuki is accepted into Heaven’s Bridge Boarding School, Japan’s most elite academy. Renowned for molding talented individuals into Ultimates - skilled professionals in their desired fields - Heaven’s Bridge accepts students between 10-20 in its pursuit of notable alumni destined to make their mark on Japanese history.

After an unfortunate tragedy forced the school into a temporary shutdown some years ago, it has now reopened, and intends to restart its prestigious legacy with its 21st class.

Unbeknownst to them, another tragedy is quickly approaching.

name: Take-Out! DS Series 2: Nippon no Yachou Daizukan
description:
You can search for the main birds found in Japan by name and feature.

The wild bird data contains a wealth of non-ecological information such as scientific name, behavior, and bark, as well as identification difficulty, rarity, and encounter points.

It is a variety of wild birds game mode that you can feel free to enjoy.

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 1+2
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 1+2 contain these episodes:

Perfection
The Choice

name: Maru Kaite DonDon Oboeru: Kyoui no Tsugawa Shiki Kanji Kioku Jutsu - Kiso Gakushuu-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 3+4
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 3+4 contain these episodes:

Halph has a Bad Day
Beethro and the Secret Society

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 5+6
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 5+6 contain these episodes:

Beethro's Teacher
Master Locks + Master Locks Expert

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 7+8
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 7+8 contain these episodes:

Devilishly Dangerous Dungeons of Doom
Smitemastery 101

name: Blood West: Dead Man’s Promise
description: Blood West: Dead Man’s Promise offers you a new story chapter of immersive stealth FPS action. The course of which will take you to a familiar place at an unfamiliar time. As Twen’s father, you will have to pay your debt to the God of Death and wrangle lost souls for his herald. Be prepared for another Weird West adventure with new eldritch horrors and new weapons to send them back to where they came from.

name: Alisa: The Parting
description: Sin descripción

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 9+10
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 9+10 contain these episodes:
Complex Complex
Suit Pursuit

name: Abducted Toad: 10th Anniversary Edition!
DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 11+12
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 11+12 contain these episodes:

Finding the First Truth
Flood Warning

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansion 13 - Treacle Stew
description:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansion 13 contains the episode Treacle Stew.

name: Immortal Souls: Dark Crusade
description: In this action RPG game you try to destroy the monsters of the underworld. You can use various attacks, which come together to form chains. This causes that their power multiplies.

name: Ritual Tides
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotel Owner Simulator
description: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: Folletti
description: In Folletti, step into the shoes of Yezac Folletti, who awakens to the horror of his wife being kidnapped by the sinister Degenite Church in the eerie land of Krycek. Embark on a quest across this bizarre realm, uncovering clues, forging alliances with quirky friends and peculiar creatures, and taking on odd quests. Unearth hidden conspiracies, brave terrifying territories, and perhaps find camaraderie in unexpected places.

name: Slender Man: Downpour
description: A classic style Slender Man game that you can play straight from your web-browser! Keep in mind that the downloadable version runs much better.

name: Thrice
description: 5 rounds of brain gymnastics, each from a different category. 3 questions per round, all with the same answer. Guessing correctly earlier in each round will award more points.

name: Slender: The Gaze Of Horror
description:
Slender: The Gaze Of Horror is a Slender game created by Italian game developer Luca Bersiga a.k.a. lukeberfiga and inspired by Slender: The Eight Pages.

It was originally released in October 2014, then remastered in May 2021 with a patch which added improvements such as new features, visual effects and stalkers to the game (the 2021 Ultimate Hardcore Patch).

name: Slender: The Haunted Metro
description: Slender: The Haunted Metro is a Slenderman-based video game, set in the abandoned metro in a city called Sanville.

name: Shining Force Cross Exlesia Zenith
description: The fourth installment of Shining Force Cross arcade series.

name: Bitorpito Deluxe
description: Bitorpito Deluxe is the sequel to Bitorpito. A game about repeating back patterns but this time in a deluxe form! Meet new game modes, graphics and more within the biggest project yet.

name: Slender: The Nine Pages
description: Sin descripción

name: Slender: Adrift
description:
Yes! This is just another Slender Man rip off.

But my friend challenged me to make a slender game. In 4 days. This forest was what I came up with (yes I used Models from my previous games).

What I am planning on Doing is for this game to be inspired by the game Slender man : Shadows.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Big Fix Up
description: Combining the latest in augmented and mixed reality, Wallace and Gromit: The Big Fix Up, is an all new epic adventure in which fans are able to experience and interact with the story as it unfolds over time. Join Wallace and his faithful hound as their latest business venture, Spick and Spanners, takes on the contract of a lifetime: to 'Fix Up' Bristol. Download our free app and play along at home, as an employee, and for the first time ever, YOU can step directly into the wonderful world of Wallace and Gromit.

name: Flora Learns to Sing!
description:
The wind blowed all of the petals of Flora, a wandering flower, and they ended up in Meatos's Swamp!

Meatos is a music instructor plant, and seems very nice! He says he will teach her to sing well so the petals can return... What could go wrong?

WARNING: This game contains disturbing images and is not meant to be played by children.

name: Fast Food On The Beach!
description: Renovate with your friends a fast food restaurant on the French beaches of Arcachon, and turn it into a renowned establishment. Cooperate, cook, and serve to achieve success!

name: Dead Abyss
description: A short first-person horror experience that places you in the rusted out hull of a mysteriously abandoned shipwreck. Search for clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the wreckage, but beware of the evil that lurks within.

name: Fisraduth: Castle of Tyramis
description: You control a knight with a sword that can swing high or low, and you fight creatures that can hit you or shoot things at you. Along the way you gain a shield that can block projectiles and can increase your armor/sword strength by going into rooms (including secret rooms) to collect powerups. You are usually limited to a single background in Family BASIC. Fisraduth uses darkness to hide portions of the background to give you the feeling of multiple rooms. There are even hidden, secret rooms.

name: Petit Royaume
description: A relaxing, free-building game set in a pixelated 3D environment.

name: Tim 7: Et l'Ordinateur Fou
description:
Tim 7: Et l'Ordinateur Fou is an edutainment game focusing on CM1 level French.

The contents of the subject are:
Know words better: Word families, homonyms, noun groups, difficult plurals.

Know the sentences better: Match the verb, match the past participle, split the sentence, master the active and passive.

Handling verbs: The present indicative and the present imperative, the past perfect and the past perfect, the imperfect and the past simple, the future indicative and the present conditional.

Read, write and describe: Distinguish the different types of text, cut out a story, make a description, write a story.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Gooing Up!
description: A brutally difficult rocket-jumping precision platformer with a charming aesthetic and a non-linear map.

name: Tim 7: Et Le Cadeau Volant
description:
Tim 7: Et Le Cadeau Volant is an edutainment game focusing on CM1 level of mathematics.

The contents in the subject are:
Figures, numbers and orders of magnitude: large numbers and decimals, comparison of integers and decimals, and sexagesimal numbers.

Operations: addition, subtraction of decimals, multiplication of integers and decimals, division, and fractions.

Geometry: geometric figures, instruments and units of measurement, calculation of areas and perimeters, and symmetry.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Rivalhearts
description: Join Noah in his first year of university as he decides to overcome his heartache, pursuing either a tomboy classmate, gorgeous doctor, or junior-year goth!

name: Spell Spiral
description: A fast-paced action shooter game where you fight while managing spells, decks, and mana just like in a card game.

name: Tim 7: Et Le Milliardaire
description:
Tim 7: Et Le Milliardaire is an edutainment game focusing on CM2 level of French.

Contens of the subject:
The components of the sentence: the noun and its determiner, the qualifying adjective and the verb.

Invariable words: adverbs, prepositions, coordinating conjunctions.

Sentence construction: distinction between sentence forms and types; independent, juxtaposed, coordinated propositions; identification of the subject group; verb complements.

Verb groups: the stem of the verb; the difficulties of the present; of the future and the imperfect; simple past and compound past; imperative present.

Spelling: accents; grammatical homophonies; the masculine of adjectives.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Escape Simulator: Mayan DLC
description: Venture deep into the mysterious Mayan jungle and unlock the secrets of four brand-new escape rooms! Inspired by iconic adventures, this DLC will test your wits and puzzle-solving skills as you explore ancient temples and face legendary challenges.

name: Escape Simulator: The Talos Principle DLC
description: In this DLC, players will face a series of intricate puzzles and challenges inspired by The Talos Principle universe. Whether you are a veteran of Escape Simulator or a fan of The Talos Principle, we believe this room will offer a unique, engaging experience that bridges the gap between these two beloved puzzle game worlds.

name: Grooveyard
description: A cryptic puzzle game where you embody a skeletal sorcerer. Use tile-creation powers to free minions from their predestined paths. Groove to the beat, solve puzzles efficiently for better ratings, and uncover mysteries.

name: Tim 7: Au Secours De Clara
description:
Tim 7: Au Secours De Clara is an edutainment game focusing on CM2 level of Mathematics.

The contents of the subject are:
Numbers: reading, writing and comparing large numbers; decimals and fractions; the different writings of a number.

Functions: digital functions; proportionality, proportional sequences; percentages and scales.

Operations: addition, subtraction and multiplication of whole numbers and decimals; multiples and divisors; division.

Measurements: units of length and area, units of volume and mass, measuring time, solving problems.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Et Le Monstre Marin
description:
Tim 7: Et Le Monstre Marin is an edutainment game focusing on 4e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
Analyze sentence structure: The expansion of nominal and verbal groups; Functional groups; The complex sentence (juxtaposition, coordination, subordination); The different subordinate clauses (conjunctives, relative, indirect interrogatives, infinitives, participles).

Conjugations:
the present and its traps; future, imperfect and simple past; the past perfect and the past perfect; the main irregular verbs

Master verb forms: The conditional and the subjunctive (the tenses of the subjunctive and the conditional, use of these 2 modes); The pitfalls of the indicator; The concordance of tenses (link between the tense of the main clause and that of its subordinate, indicative and subjunctive); Active voice, passive voice, pronominal turn.

Enrich your vocabulary: Root, prefix and suffix (place and role); Polysemy (definition and semantic field, homonyms); The lexical field (definition and extent, concrete and abstract); The use of the exact word.

Manipulate the language: The poem (lines, rhymes, emphasis, sounds, stanzas); The dialogue (directions, scenes, sequences of lines, monologue, aside); The story (definition, narrator, time and stages of the story, characters); The description; Figures of speech (comparison, metaphor, hyperbole, antithesis).

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Et L'eclipse Totale
description:
Tim 7: Et L'eclipse Totale is an edutainment game focusing on 4e level of Mathematics.

The contents of the subject are:
Master the calculation: Relative numbers and decimal relative numbers (rule of signs and parentheses); Fractions and inverse; Powers and scientific notation; Statistics (count table, frequencies, percentage of a value).

Calculate with an unknown: Development (formulas, factorization); Order and operations; Equation (equate and solve); Proportionality, speed and linear application.

Manipulate the figures: Projections (theorem of the midpoints of the sides of a triangle); Orthogonal and cosine projections (orthogonal projection, coordinates of the midpoint of a segment, cosine of an angle); Translations and rotations (image of a figure and a segment, tracing method); Spheres and balls (area and volume).

Know how to demonstrate: Lines, circles and distances (tangent, axis of symmetry, bisector); Remarkable triangles and lines (orthocenter, median, bisector, height, bisector, center of gravity, inscribed circle); Pythagorean theorem and its converse; Right triangle.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Carved In Stone
description: Sin descripción

name: The Traded Groom
description: a short 18+ otome about getting to know your new husband

name: Yozemi no Center Shoujun Series: Eigo-hen
description: Yozemi no Center Shoujun Series: Eigo Hen is an English learning game designed specifically for Japanese students, focusing on helping players improve their hearing and speaking skills in English. The game contains rich English vocabulary and grammar topics, as well as real English conversation recordings, allowing players to learn English in an interactive game environment. In addition, the game also provides a variety of learning models and challenge levels to help players gradually improve their English level. Whether they are beginners or players with a certain English foundation, they can use this game to enhance their English skills. if you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

name: The Dawn Of Slenderman
description:
The Dawn of Slenderman is a first-person horror survival game to find the required pages and to either avoid or kill Slenderman.

- Collect 8 pages to win
- 2 levels with day and night mode
- 4 levels to play
- Original realistic sounds
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Original Eight Pages made by JD Thunder

name: Ghost Hunter
description: Ghost Hunter is an Atari 400/800 game that puts a unique spin on the classic Pac-Man formula. Set in a haunted mansion on Huckleberry Hill, players control a character tasked with eliminating ghosts by consuming dots in a maze. The game supports both single and simultaneous two-player modes, pitting players against four increasingly aggressive ghosts across 15 pre-designed levels and a random level generator. Ghost Hunter introduces innovative features such as an "instant-hide" ability, allowing players to temporarily vanish to evade ghosts once per life. Additionally, players can collect character fragments scattered throughout the maze to earn extra lives. With its familiar maze-navigation gameplay, power pellets for ghost vulnerability, and progressive difficulty, Ghost Hunter offers a fresh take on the beloved arcade classic while adding its own supernatural twist.

name: Tim 7: Et La Correspondante
description:
Tim 7: Et La Correspondante is an edutainment game focusing on 5e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
The pitfalls of verb/subject agreement: identify the subject: proper noun, infinitive, pronoun, simple or extended noun group; know what the indefinite pronoun represents; master the subject relative pronoun; impersonal forms, “this+being”, collective subject: identify the real subject.

Study of the word: etymology; radical, prefix, suffix; homonyms and paronyms; compound nouns.

Conjugations: verbs of the third group: present indicative and simple past; compound tenses: past anterior and future anterior; present subjunctive, present imperative and present conditional.

Qualifying adjective and past participle: agreement of the qualifying adjective; masculine plural and feminine of qualifying adjectives; agreement of the past participle with the auxiliaries être and avoir.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Mene Le Jeu
description:
Tim 7: Mene Le Jeu is an edutainment game focusing on 5e level of Mathematics.

The contents of the subject are:
Calculation on integers and positive decimals: use of parentheses; distributiveness and calculation priorities; write expressions.

Operations on fractions: comparison, addition, subtraction and multiplication of fractions; solving equations using fractions.

Relative decimal numbers: comparison, addition and subtraction of relative numbers; solving equations using relative numbers.

Data interpretation and management: proportionality coefficient and graphic representation; calculation of percentages; graphic representations: bar, semi-circular, circular diagrams; meaning of scales; calculation of average speeds.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Game Of Thrall'an
description: Game of Thrall'an is an action RPG where players take on the role of a character named Thrall'an, embarking on a journey to the icy land of Alterrac, filled with enemies, to destroy the Ice Lord, Lookholar.

name: Tim 7: The Memories From Nowhere
description:
Tim 7: The Memories From Nowhere is an edutainment game focusing on 5e level of English.

The contents of the subject are:
Description: Express possession (to have, whose, possessive adjectives and pronouns, genitive); Express quantity (some and any, quantifiers); Locate intimate (prepositions and adverbs of time); Locate in space (there + be, prepositions, plural of nouns, articles).

Tell a story: Talk about one's activities (present simple and progressive); Talk about one can or must do (modal verbs); Talk about what one did (simple and continuous past), Talk about what one is going to do (future with will, be going to, present with future value).

Perfect one's expression: Tell one's experiences, Compare (comparatives and superlatives), Give details (conjunctions and adverbs), Report a speech (direct and indirect speech).

Master conversation: Suggest (suggest, propose, order); Give one's opinion; Talk (tag questions); Give and ask for information.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Pina Colada 2
description: Pina Colada 2 is a set of 27 MBF21 maps for Doom 2. These maps use the same gimmicks from the first set: a 75 monster limit in maps that are short, dense, and interconnected.

name: Yangshuo Invasion
description: Doom 1 episode replacement with familiar guns and demons modified for more lightweight, fast-paced gameplay, plus a bunch of unique additional features. Built around Bite-Sized Threats, a vanilla-compatible gameplay mod that speeds up the pace of Doom by drastically reducing both monster health and ammo available.

name: Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S
description:
Tim 7: Lance Un S.O.S is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
Agreements: the plural of nouns; agreement of adjectives, verb and past participle.
