Conjugations: the present and its pitfalls; future, imperfect and simple past; the past perfect and the past perfect; the main irregular verbs.

Frequent confusions: conjugated verb or common noun; infinitive in “er” or past participle in “é”; or/where; and/is ; his/are; a/to; upper or lower case.

Write the key sounds: the sounds [o], [f], [k] and the sounds written with the letters x, y and z.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Et L'envoye Special
description:
Tim 7: Et L'envoye Special is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
Story structure: Linking words, Use of the past simple and the imperfect, Use of relative and possessive pronouns.

Oral expression: The interrogative sentence, Circumstantial complements, Language registers.

Construction of a presentation: text comprehension, image playback, values ​​of the present, active/passive voice.

Written expression: expression of order, advice and wish, lexical fields of will and feelings, the expression of the condition, punctuation.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Concours Pour New York
description:
Tim 7: Concours Pour New York is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of Mathematics.

The contents of the subject are:
Decimal writing - fractional writing: decimal fractions; multiplication and division by multiples of 10; arrangement of decimal numbers.

Operations on decimals: addition, subtraction and multiplication of decimals and decimal fractions; orders of magnitude and approximations; solving problems with decimals.

Division: dividing whole numbers and decimal numbers; solve division problems; divide with fractions.

Numerical calculation: calculate with and without parentheses; calculate with fractions; solve simple equations; learn to calculate quickly.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: Et Les Fouilles Interdites
description:
Tim 7: Et Les Fouilles Interdites is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of history and geography.

The contents of the subject are:
Ancient Egypt: the Nile valley in Ancient Egypt; chronological benchmarks; the powers of the pharaoh; the religion of the Egyptians during Antiquity.

Ancient Greece: Greek cities and colonies; Athenian democracy; the domination of Athens; the epic of Alexander the Great.

Ancient Rome: the Roman Republic; the Roman Empire and the Roman Peace; the Romanization of Gaul; religion and the Roman state.

The Mediterranean basin today: people around the Mediterranean; a natural environment: the Mediterranean environment; a metropolis of a poor country: Cairo; a tourist coastline: the Côte d’Azur.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Tim 7: The Lost Traveller
description:
Tim 7: The Lost Traveller is an edutainment game focusing on 6e level of English.

The contents of the subject are:
Introduce oneself: Give one's name, age and address (say hello and goodbye, To be, introduce yourself, figures and numbers); Talk about one's activities (use and formation of simple and progressive present tenses); Say what one has or not (to have, genitive, possessive articles, whose); Introduce and describe someone.

Locate oneself: Locate in space; Indicate directions (prepositions); Know how to say the date and the hour (time, date, year, seasons); Locate in time (preposition of time, adverbs of frequency, yesterday/today, before/after)

Say: Describe one's environment (colors, demonstrative adjectives, some and any);Say what one can and must do; Say what one did (past tense, regular and irregular verbs); Say what one is going to do (be going to).

Talk: Express one's opinion (comparatives, agreeing/disagreeing); Ask an information (questions); Say what one likes or would like to do (like, love, hate, want, would like); Give information and ask for it (common expressions, imperative, question tags).

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.

name: Angry Birds Block Quest
description: Master the Block placements in this brand new Puzzle game! Work your way through novel levels and relax with satisfying mechanics

name: Wuthering Waves: When the Night Knocks
description:
Version 1.4 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Camellya and Lumi
• New main event: Somnium Labyrinth
• New companion story for Camellya: Forking Path Among the Stars
• New echoes, events and more!

name: C-Smash VRS: New Dimension
description: C-Smash VRS New Dimension offers a whole new kind of Hybrid Multiplayer, allowing PS5 players to play with other PS5 players, but also across dimensions with PS VR2 players. Fully immersed and physical or in third person, complete with a multitude of accessibility options - a world first for a sports title.

name: Mobs 'N Monsters
description: Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!

name: Killpaku!
description: A 3D action game where you control Bebe, a gluttonous monster. Aim at the weak points of the fighting "onis" and deal the final blow! Literally, enjoy picking the best parts!

name: Slendrina Must Die: The House
description:
Slendrina Must Die: The House is yet another fantastic episode in the creepy Slendrina Must Die series. In this title, you get to find out more about this strange and sinister creature and her origins.

Game is based on House of Slendrina.

name: Chosen of God
description: "Chosen of God" thrusts you into the heart of an ancient world, brutal and fraught with danger. You are David, a young shepherd destined to become king. Wield your weapons to face giants, ruthless warriors, and ferocious beasts.

name: Slendrina Must Die: The Asylum
description:
Slendrina Must Die is back in a new scary adventure! The Asylum! Now with new level added (currently Android only), The Asylum Backyard. More Action.

Game is based on Slendrina: Asylum

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 Remix
description: The Island you knew is back, remixed and reimagined, with weekly location and loot drops inspired by the best of early Chapter 2 OG gameplay and some of the greatest music icons in history. In this time rewind, Snoop D-O-double-G heads up the Agency, the rap god Eminem sets up shop in the Grotto, hip hop princess Ice Spice lays claim to Shark Island, and the remix hits the finale with a celebration and tribute to the legend and icon, Juice WRLD. Push play, turn up the volume, and open up the vault in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 2 Remix!

name: Further Skies
description:
Further Skies takes place in 2008, following a pair of childhood friends adjusting to the ever-shifting world of online communication and relationships, which allows their world to become ever larger - for better and for worse.

This is a story about being a young person in an online age that doesn't quite exist in the form it once did anymore. About communication, paranoia, grief, the joy of finding your people and your place, and the road to equanimity and internal harmony.

name: The Spire of Mech Zero
description: A lite roguelike card deck building game inspired by Slay the Spire. You can experience battles of robots with cards and components! Try to conquer the spire with one perfect run, every choice matters!

name: Stalcraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic 2 SMS/GG 16-Bit
description: Save Tails from the clutches of Dr. Robotnik in this complete re-imagining of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Master System and Game Gear!

name: Sonic Sundown
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunset Riders
description: The Genesis port of the Arcade Classic

name: Hotel Mario ReBooked
description: A fan-made port of Hotel Mario for PC.

name: Mean Bean Tsuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Tails' Picross
description: Tails' Picross is a fangame inspired by the Picross game series and other Mega Drive puzzle games. In this game, you will need to clear puzzles using the clues on each row and each collumn of the grid.

name: La Chose De Grotemburg
description:
La Chose de Grotemburg is a text adventure with graphics in French. The protagonist returns to his town after travelling to find his young wife dead. The search for the one responsible bring the character to different locations such a forest, an underground environment and a mansion where the one responsible resides.

Most of the screen provides a view of the environment with detailed graphics. At the bottom of the screen text descriptions appear and commands are entered. On the right possible movement options based on the four wind directions are displayed.

name: Miko Miko Nurse
description: The story takes place in the Paradise Hospital, the forefront of elderly treatment. As a result of the founder's retirement, the two heirs cannot agree on which uniform the nurses should wear — one having a miko style, the other having a nun style. Amidst the fierce debate is Tatsuya Makishima, a doctor-in-training....

name: Slendrina Must Die: The Forest
description:
Slendrina Must Die: The Forest is a fantastic first-person shooter with horror elements. You must uncover the sinister and strange Slendrina who lives within a dark and mysterious forest with her mother and children.

You must explore the forest and locate seven keys that will help you complete the mission and unlock the dark secrets surrounding this woman.

Game is based on Slendrina: The Forest

name: Chuushaki: Hirasawa Nurse School
description: A young girl named Mana is determine to become a good nurse. She plans to attend the Hirasawa Nurse School, which was also the place where her late mother studied. However, upon arrival Mana finds out that strange things are happening in the school. Not only some of the teachers are acting weird, but the fellow aspiring nurses seem to be more interested in sex than in actually learning their profession...

name: Liminal Shroud
description: A psychological exploration experience that takes you deep into the heart of uncanny, in-between spaces where reality unravels. There are no monsters here—only the shadows of your own mind. Navigate strangely layered rooms, interact with the environment and unlock secrets to escape.

name: Shades
description: Shades is a really immersive solo FPS with infiltration, espionage and tactical extraction shooter aspects, to do a variety of missions as a mercenary for an agency that really use your skills to make this world better.

name: Chu x Chu Idol
description: Kensuke is an ordinary uni student, living alone. One day, he happens to know Chiyu's secret. Chiyu transforms into a popular idol by kissing Chuchu, a vampire girl. Chuchu finds Kensuke knows their secret, and curses him not to stay away from them. As a result, they start to live together... Will he be able to get rid of the curse?

name: Burst!
description: Burst! is the science-powered rhythm game that puts you in charge of a fireworks show! You blow up fireworks to the beat while swapping out elements from the Periodic Table to change the explosion colors!!

name: Ace of Wands
description: A doujin fighting game released at Comiket 81 following a story of nanomachines spread throughout the city

name: Slendrina Must Die: The School
description:
Slendrina Must Die - The School - is an intense and exciting horror game in which you must further explore the character of Slendrina. This evil entity is truly haunting and stops at nothing to hurt you.

Game is based on Slendrina: The School

name: Mushroom Kingdom Showdown 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Borderline
description: Borderline is a free running first person adventure heavily inspired by the momentum-based gameplay from Mirror’s Edge. You are tasked with working against the city of Greyhawke’s most notorious mega corporations, uncovering their secrets while navigating through their state-of-the-art security.

name: Fracas
description: Fracas is a dungeon crawler that evokes a retro RPG experience and a complex story. In its short duration, it seeks to keep you intrigued as you solve the mystery behind this enigmatic character that has society on the brink of collapse.

name: Bona Fido
description: Sin descripción

name: Starlaxy Cats
description:
Save the planet!
Help your cats on their one-way journey to space to protect and save the planet in an action-packed shoot 'em up adventure, featuring various characters, adversaries, and more!

A threat from outer space is approaching, and you will need to utilize different tools and upgrades for your spaceship, piloted by one of your adorable cats. Together, they will do their best to rescue planet Earth.

name: Royalty Free-For-All
description: Royalty Free-For-All is a hand-drawn cartoon Party Brawler featuring an original cast of characters inspired by the public domain! Join Dorothy, Sweeney Todd, Mother Goose, and more as they duke it out in hand-drawn platform fighting mayhem!

name: Royal Montgomery Raceways
description:
Royal Montgomery Raceways is a vintage racing game set between the years 1913 and 1939; covering the golden age of racing across the world.
RMR is still in development.

name: Yandere Tensei: I Can't Beat The Programming!
description:
Mei (name changeable) is an overworked office worker at a black company, who suddenly collapses on the office floor just as she's about to head home after a late night. As she laments her fate and thinks about the bright side of dying at work (enjoy the stigma of working an employee to death, company!), her only regret is that she couldn't read her favourite character's ending in an otome game she loved one last time. But after her vision fades to black, she comes to... right in front of said favourite character in the flesh?! It turns out she was reincarnated as the villainess her bias, Albert, is in love with, just as he's confining her to his manor in his obsession ending!

But unfortunately, despite the miraculous circumstances, things aren't all roses for our heroine. Just as she's about to jump headfirst into a lovey-dovey life with her best boy, the villainess Meirina's original personality yanks control of the body away from her to express her disgust, just as she did in the original ending. It turns out that the original Meirina's mind takes priority when it comes to dealing with Albert. But a strange sound as the villainess's heart flutters opens up a method to get our heroine's desired ending: raise Meirina's affection levels for Albert until she accepts his mad love, so that they can fall into the darkness together!

name: Lando: Me? A Hero?
description: Thrown into a strange world by an angel, you’ll fight, adapt, and evolve in this action-packed roguelike. Combine insane powers, conquer new worlds with each run, and face relentless enemies. Will you rise as the hero—or fall trying?

name: Cardfight Area
description: Cardfight Area is a third-party software used to play Cardfight!! Vanguard online for free, receiving updates regularly as new cards release. The game provides an alternative method for people to playtest new units, connect with other players, and play Cardfight!! Vanguard when in-person cardfights are not available.

name: Speedy Speedy Cat Slowly
description: A single button run game. You can use ropes and balloons to advance. There is also a gravity reversal.

name: Loopdio
description: Loopido is a minimalistic platform puzzle game where you need to get a ball through a warp field. Depending on the game mode you either control the ball or the world.

name: A Boring Place: The Road 2 Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Top Heroes: Kingdom Saga
description:
On this distant and mysterious continent, countless unknown miracles and challenges are hidden. Here live magical creatures of various forms, each with their unique culture and profound secrets. Their legends and stories, filled with magic and myth, ignite the curiosity of every adventurer.

However, a powerful and terrifying dark force is spreading and threatening the peace and tranquility of this continent. Facing this dark tide, brave warriors from different races and cultures have stepped forward. They vow to unite and resist this evil force together.

In this passionate and adventurous game, you will play as a brave leader, leading these warriors through mysterious forests, ancient ruins, and dark caves to explore every corner of this continent. On the journey, you will encounter various wonderful creatures, uncover forgotten ancient secrets, discover hidden treasures, and fight against various powerful enemies.

Your wisdom, courage, and strategy will be the key to defeating the dark forces and protecting the peace of the continent. Rally your team, select appropriate equipment and spells, and fight for the future of this continent! In this grand adventure, every choice and battle is of great significance. Now, it's time to embark on this journey to save the world!

name: Ratshaker
description: RATSHAKER is the fun and quirky solution to all your rat problems! Hold on to the RAT, shake your arm, and watch life’s problems disappear! How far can you go?

name: JellyFish
description: In this game by TheR you control a jellyfish swimming underwater among other animals and trying to not get hit by them. Some of them will actively try to hit you. Try to get a high score and save it in your memory card.

name: Slender: New Hope
description: Slender - New Hope is based on Slender: The Eight Pages, but with modern graphic, better AI, bigger environment & discoverable deep woods!

name: Party Man
description: Party Man, by Srxraposo, is a Pac-Man clone where you have to keep drinking more beer!

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A basic Tic Tac Toe game for Vircon32, made by Chandler Kluser. This version is 2-player only, so you will need a second gamepad to play with a friend.

name: Slender: Dark Woods
description:
Slender - Dark Woods is based on Slender: The Eight Pages, but with a completely different environment, dynamic jumpscares & environment, modern graphics, new mechanics and a Co-op mode.

You can choose to play singleplayer or local co-op on 3 different difficulty levels.

name: Premier Manager
description: A football management simulation game featuring teams from the 2010–11 English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, and Scottish Leagues.

name: Zhen Jia Hou Wang
description: A platformer based off Journey to the West.

name: Waddle Knight
description:
Waddle Knight is a Kirby fangame with gameplay similar to Hollow Knight that stars Bandana Waddle Dee! Kirby gets kidnapped by a dark creature, and it's up to Bandana Waddle Dee to save him!
Waddle Knight is intended to be played for fun, and isn't intended to make the player angry or frustrated, but the game itself is very hard. If the game is too challenging, feel free to turn on Easy Mode.

name: The Overnight Watch
description:
Welcome Subject/Employee to 'The Overnight Watch'. This experiment/exam will take a total of 5 business days to complete.

Your objective during this experiment/exam is to watch the cameras and report anything that you find out of the ordinary.

Each day you will be pushed even further by watching more rooms and having to keep an eye on the Power Containment Drive. Failure is NOT an option.

Do you 'IRIS SUBJECT NUMBER' wish to apply to 'The Overnight Watch'?

Please note:

IRIS will not take responsibility for a subject's death during this test.

name: Ice League Hockey
description: Grab your sticks and face off at center ice in Koality Game's Ice League Hockey! Choose a league, select a team and lead your players to the Cup. Get charged with a penalty for fighting and test your defense. Or attack on a power play and use your passing skills to catch your opponents off guard. Either way, you can become the next dynasty in the hottest hockey game on ice. This is the Ice League.

name: G-Switch 4: Creator
description: Sin descripción

name: The Abandoned House
description: "The Abandoned House" is a 3D Horror game where you play as a ghost and your job is to help and guide the NPC Girl in escaping the house while also avoiding the hostile Monster that lurks in the shadows.

name: Kamalatale
description: Kamala is tasked with fighting for a New Way Forward that protects our fundamental freedoms and strengthens our democracy! Debate your way through a divided nation, secure endorsements and future voters, and finish what your mentor, Joe Biden, started!

name: Monoyellow Madness
description: Backrooms game with procedurally generated rooms and corridors.

name: Sumrak
description: A short visual novel about fear, choice, miracle, adventure, friendship, love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. At the beginning of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of a mini-platformer to find out what happens next.

name: Fortnite: Kyran Aryk Crew Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Horn of Balance
description: A fangame inspired by A Link to the Past, which ultimately became an original IP, Horn of Balance.

name: Ancient Keys DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Toad and the Ancient Keys
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Ancient Keys
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario in Marooned on Mars!
description:
Super Mario in Marooned on Mars is a hybrid tribute to both one of gaming's all-time favorite heroes and PC's platforming pioneer, Commander Keen!

Play as Mario as he finds the missing parts of his spaceship so he and his passengers can travel back to the Mushroom Kingdom safe and sound. There are over fifteen levels here on Mars, but you only need the four ship parts to get out of there! That's not to say there's no reason to explore anywhere once you have them. Oh, of course not!

You can talk to your passengers for tips or casual interactions, and you can discover tons of secrets and goodies as you romp around the monster-infested environment. Just be sure to keep on your toes! You're going to need all the ammo and power-ups you can get!

name: Swing Swing Swing
description:
Swing Swing Swing is a short-and-sweet adventure through a mysterious wireframe world, BUT with one important twist: you can't move!

Well, not directly at least. Attach your grapple hook to surfaces and let gravity SWING you forward!

name: Eternity
description: Sin descripción

name: 13th House on Halloween
description:
You finally bought a house, but it's the 13th house on the street and it's Halloween... so who knows what you actually bought...

Are you ready to experience why is it a bad idea to go against superstition on Halloween? In this game you will get to and see the consequences, and maybe even live trough it... but who knows, anything can happen on Halloween...

name: Good Night Mr. Snoozleberg
description: Expert diplomat Mr. Snoozleberg has a busy schedule: bullet-train inaugurations, movie awards, alien invasions, theme park visits. He can handle everything, though, as long as he gets a good night rest... and his sleepwalking makes that difficult. It'll be up to you to prevent international incidents by point and clicking objects at the right time to form a safe platforming path!

name: Colourspace
description: Sin descripción

name: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me
description: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me is a short horror game where reality blurs with nightmares over five eerie days. Experience strange events, unsettling dreams, and unravel a chilling mystery in a remote house. Can you survive the madness, or will the nightmare consume you?

name: The Devious Four Chronicles 8: Goddess Robes
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Workers Island
description: A short horror story about a screensaver.

name: Nightly Hobo
description: You have lost everything and now you have to loot dumpsters and return bottles to feed yourself.

name: Symphony of the Stars
description: A retro RPG that features puzzles, exploration, and turn-based combat.

name: Vtubers Network
description: This game is about Jynx, Zero, Ichi, and Rel trying to escape this game made by Ai their friend. So their job is to find their friend Ai to see him But they need to fight against all Ai's friends worldwide. But first, WE JUST NEED SOME MONEY (reference)

name: Danball Senki
description:
Originally released in 2011 for Playstation Portable, Denball senki became more popular and known in the west later in 2015 as "LBX: Little Battlers eXperience".
The original version of the game was announced and planned before the manga and anime adaptations, which came out slightly before the game release.

name: Cherish Pizza ha Ikaga Desu ka
description: The story of a college student who was decides to work part-time at a pizzeria "Cherish Pizza". What kind of life will he have at this part-time job?

name: Super Mario: Red Scare
description: Sin descripción

name: SAGE 5: Event the Game
description: In 2002, that year's second SAGE was itself a fan game, which contained all of the usual information and booths. The player could choose from a number of characters to explore a virtual SAGE show floor, visiting booths and trying out games. Some special mini games could be unlocked.

name: You're Gonna Die 1000 Times (Or So)
description:
You have been accused of endangering the lives of 1000 people. As punishment, you will be cloned and killed 1000 times.

Can one version of you escape prison, using nothing but a match and whatever items you find around?

name: Late Night Sausage
description:
In the sparse, remote reaches of northern Sweden, Late Night Sausage plunges you into a horror experience inspired by chilling true events that may feel disturbingly familiar.

Complete your nightly chores: take out the garbage, do the laundry and most importantly, grab a sausage at the local gas station. As night falls, mundane routines twist into chilling encounters. Each event reveals more about the townsfolk and every night brings new dark discoveries. Can you maintain your sanity in this horror walking simulation?

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kuradashi-hen
description: “Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kuradashi-hen” is a collection of "what if?" stories derived from scrapped concepts in the writing and development of the original story, showing the way Ryukishi07 went on writing the stories and his thought development process for the Higurashi series. This is a fan visual novel adaptation of the original.

name: Cryptic Crawlz
description:
Cryptic Crawlz: Dive into the depths of an enigmatic dungeon where mystery and danger lurk at every turn. Combining the thrilling action of a Hack-and-Slash RPG with the cerebral challenges of a point-and-click adventure,

Cryptic Crawlz offers a unique gaming experience. Embark on a journey filled with dark secrets, treacherous puzzles, and formidable foes as you navigate the labyrinthine corridors. Unravel the cryptic lore and conquer sinister adversaries in this spellbinding fusion of Hack-and-Slash combat and intricate puzzle-solving. Are you prepared to uncover the secrets that lie beneath?

name: Klondike's Hike
description: A solitaire-based game with roguelike and deck-building elements.

name: Eufloria Classic
description: Eufloria Classic brings back the original charms of the long-unavailable indie classic, updated for a new age with a plethora of new content and features, including extreme moddability.

name: Gensou Rouman Kikou: Phantasmagoria Trues
description:
Gensou Rouman Kikou―Phantasmagoria Trues― ("Fantasy Romance Travel Log") is a Touhou fan game made by Len in Danmakufu. It is a remake of his earlier game Phantasm Romance, containing an overhauled game system, three game modes, and an extra stage.

The game spans six regular areas as well as three "unseen" areas which the player must unlock via special means. In addition to this, the game also contains a Terminus area which serves as a counterpart to the Extra stage in the main Touhou series.

The game's system revolves around a combination of factors, including a multiplier that is increased by items, bonuses caused by grazing, and a hyper system that duplicates point items and allows the player to cancel bullets into items. There is also a "simple" mode that works like Phantasm Romance, with the multiplier, graze and hyper system removed.

name: Math Genius: Multiplication
description: Math Genius: Multiplication is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated multiplication problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Colorfuly Ball
description: In Colorfuly Ball, a simple yet engaging game, guide your ball to the right colors and overcome obstacles to collect points. This exciting game will test your speed and reflexes as you face different challenges at each level!

name: Dragon's Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Mechanic Supermarket 2024
description: Master the art of running a supermarket and tuning cars!

name: Halloween Memory Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Buildozer Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Skibidi Toilet: Battle Royale
description: Sin descripción

name: Alpine Zone
description: Sin descripción

name: McBelle Manor
description: McBelle Manor is a Survival Horror game that takes you to an old, abandoned house that has been turned into the latest Halloween attraction.

name: Parahcuy
description: Andi and his friends' adventure in eradicating injustice and bullying in their school environment.

name: Mecha Arena
description: The objective of this advanced mecha-builder RPG game game is to carefully construct, upgrade, and maintain your own combat robot. Do battle against other mechas in random and competition matches and tournaments. Train the skills of the mecha rider, hire staff for the mecha garage, and much more!

name: Arcane Quest
description:
Once again, the Empire is in trouble. Obscure forces infest the underground dungeons and threaten the peace of the upper world.
Plunge into the depths of darkness with your team of heroes and fight evil creatures to reach your goal. Courage, bravery, and intelligence will all be needed if you are to succeed.

name: Gummy Jump 2
description: You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you

name: Arcane Quest 4
description:
The galaxy is under siege as OmniCorp threatens to dominate every planet and harvest the precious Arcane Stones that power advanced machines and weapons.
Unite with heroes from across the universe to form the Galactic Alliance and stand against this formidable enemy in this epic turn-based RPG adventure.

name: Arcane Quest Adventures
description:
This first spin-off in the Arcane Quest series brings a brand new gameplay style, while keeping the classic board game mechanics that you loved!

Enter this rogue-like adventure in a fantasy world populated with goblins, orcs, undead, and many other terrible creatures.

name: Ninety Thousand Acres
description:
Use your strategic mind in relaxing gameplay!
How many acres of land can you develop from 1 acre?

name: Brain Code
description: Welcome to brain code, a collection of hard puzzle games that will test the full power of your brain! With 50 unique levels, you'll need to use your creativity, attentiveness, and problem-solving skills to find the solutions.

name: Arcade Archives: Riot
description: " RIOT " is an action game released by TECMO in 1992. Conquer the stages while defeating the "THE MAGIC TIGERS", warriors armed with special weapons and magic that stand in your way one after another. Enemies appear in the front and back of the screen, so you need to shoot them separately. The key to success is to make good use of various weapons and shields along the way.

name: Finding America: The Great Lakes - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sleeping: Counting Sheep
description: A relaxing, Twitch-integrated sheep simulation where viewers can spawn and chat as sheep. Perfect for streamers looking to entertain their audience while resting or away from their keyboard.

name: Mana Monsters
description:
Mana Monsters is a completely fresh and epic take on classic free match 3 puzzle games!

Collect, hatch, level and upgrade a multitude of mighty mana monsters, create an elite battle team, and compete for ultimate glory by testing your skills in the arena against the best players in the world!

name: Snaky Snakes
description: Slither through challenges, grow longer, and unlock exciting worlds!

name: Hang Glider Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Defeat Me
description: Sin descripción

name: Rage Effect
description: Crafted with passion by Goldon Studios, a rising game studio from rural India, Rage Effect delivers an explosive FPS/TPS experience like no other.

name: For The Win
description: Welcome to FTW, the fast-paced Multiplayer Battle Royale Hero Shooter! Dive into non-stop action, claim rewards in tournaments every week, and play with friends in quick, exciting multiplayer matches.

name: Bricks Kingdom
description: In a realm where magic and mechanics have come together in perfect harmony, life thrives on the vibrant energy of Superbricks. Yet ominous clouds loom over this tranquil land of brick-builders. The mysterious Shadow Waves have their own plans for the power of these bricks, and it will take brave heroes to safeguard this power and save their world.

name: Outlaw Cowboy
description: Welcome to Outlaw Cowboy, a thrilling simulation and strategy game that immerses you in the treacherous world of the American West. Set during the pioneering days of the Wild West, where the feverish gold rush attracted hordes of settlers, you will assume the role of a fearless bounty hunter. Your mission: conquer all that this lawless land has to offer.

name: Jigsaw Chronicles: Haunting Tales
description: Piece together haunting tales from around the world.

name: Cozy Claw Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Racer
description: APEX Racer strives to deliver the most authentic representation of the tuning culture. Dozens of cars and hundreds of parts available for you to plan and build your ultimate ride. Trick out your project car with our robust tuning system, express yourself and make your car shine. New parts are always being added, so there's always a bit of something for everyone!

name: Apex Racer
description: Build, Customize, Race! Take on the world's best racers as you race through elaborate fast-paced tracks in the most thrilling racing simulation experience on mobile! Inspired by a popular toy that was introduced in Asia back in the 90s. It is a plastic model race car without a remote control. These model race cars are mostly referred to as Mini 4WD due to its all-wheel-drive nature

name: Stalker: Spatial Trap
description: The game will introduce you to the story of a stalker named Zmej. The mercenary, by a strange coincidence, falls into a spatial anomaly, where other laws, a shortage of resources and total hopelessness operate. What is behind this? Will Zmej be able to find a way out of this trap? You have to figure it out.

name: Return Survival
description: Go back six months before the world was destroyed?! Perhaps this is an opportunity? Or a recurring despair? The Great Plague that struck the earth is a zombie apocalypse. For three years, I persevered to survive dozens of deadly situations in a devastated land. In the end, I was cornered and, trapped among the zombies, died. And... when I opened my eyes again... I went back to that month before the zombie virus broke out in the world! In the next six months, this peaceful world will be destroyed. And only I know that the end is near! Is this the chance that was given to me to survive again in a shattered world?! Six months - is it hope or despair?

name: I'm in Love With Your Dead Grandmother Presents: Noah SmallJohnson's Puzzle Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2021: Asia
description: Sin descripción

name: Vicera
description: Vicera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?

name: The Adventure of Ninomae Ina'nis
description: The Adventure of Ninomae Ina'nis is a vertical shoot 'em up game where you control Ninomae Ina'nis from Hololive Myth and her companion AO-chan.

name: Kamen Rider Decade
description: Mod for the 2017 indie game Slay The Spire, based on the Kamen Rider series, and the "Kamen Rider Decade" installment

name: Halo 2 Digsite: E3 2003 Demo
description:
Revisit the debut prototype of Halo 2 in this restoration of the notorious "Earth City" demonstration, initially unveiled at the Xbox press conference during E3 2003.

For the first time ever, take it to the streets, your way, with support for cooperative action, optional navigation points to rehearse the exact demo path and an included 'Playground' version of the level, allowing free roam of the city.

This release represents an effort to rebuild content originally designed for a different functioning game engine, the first campaign collaboration between Digsite and Halo Studios.

name: Furries & Scalies & Scarecrows Oh My!
description: The island of Roanoake is a small, quaint farming community that has recently been swept up in the king's war effort. Crops and weaponry are needed to provide the troops with food and a way to fight the enemy. Many on the island feel that this is an impairment on their way of life, and many feel that it is not. Can you navigate this sea of discomfort in order to make the island of Roanoake prosperous once more?

name: Astronomicon
description: In this atmospheric puzzle game with cute original art and music, you're playing as a navigator of a small caravel. Study the constellations and test your visual perception skills to find your way in the endless ocean.

name: Escaping Diddler
description: Escaping Diddler is a stealth survival game where you escaped the Diddler party, while navigating Diddler's Backyard, Steal bottles of baby oil to escape, but beware—getting caught means game over. Stay hidden, outsmart the Diddler, and escape.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season 3: Season of Lawless
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League – Season of Lawless launched on October 1, 2024, adding Zoe Lawton (Lawless) as a playable character, a Gotham-themed Elseworld location, new missions, Infamy gear sets, and a Battle Pass. The update is available for all platforms as a free expansion.

name: Shadow's Descent
description: "Shadows' Descent" is a psychological horror game where you investigate a very special hospital, full of mysteries and dangers. Solve puzzles, discover terrifying secrets, and survive an oppressive atmosphere where every shadow can be a threat.

name: Bad Time Trio
description: This is the original bad time trio. by mcatr

name: Airborne Justice
description: Airborne Justice is a shoot 'em up that pays homage to classics from the golden age of video games. Take control of a helicopter, fight enemies, and restore peace to the skies!

name: OttGiu
description:
An otter on the way to save your friends.

Follow Giuseppe on this adventure!

name: The Binding of Isaac: Repentance+
description: The Binding of Isaac Repentance+ is an update to The Binding of Isaac Repentance, adding in online multiplayer co-op and reworking otherwise poorly regarded items.

name: Hockey Super Squad
description: Hockey Super Squad is a thrilling free to play 3v3 multiplayer online hockey game featuring character creation and lite-RPG mechanics. Jump in alone or with friends!

name: Mushroom Pancakes
description: The last fan game created by supertoad2k. You play as Mario/Beardman as he goes on a quest to collect the 3 missing handle pieces of Star 'Buck' Sampson in order to get more red ink for Mario's pen.

name: Sugobencha: Dragon Master Silk Gaiden
description: Sin descripción

name: Moekasu
description: Among other goodies there are two stories based on the extended world of Moekan's Kirishima route and Tsui no Sora.

name: Waifu Impact 2
description:
Waifu Impact 2 is a third person shooter, adventure game with role-playing elements where you explore the Waifu Islands to unlock new characters and abilities.

Discover the secrets of the paradisiac Waifu Islands. Shoot and level up your characters in this sequel of the acclaimed Waifu Impact.

name: Artemis Blue
description:
In 2040, a mysterious natural disaster causes all planes to stop functioning above 500 feet (150 meters) of the Earth’s surface, resulting in over 20 million deaths. The year is 2060 and it is forbidden to fly above this limit. Pilots call this stretch from 500 feet to outer space ‘Artemis’s hymen’. Now a group of people operate a transport agency from the abandoned building that was to be the New Third Tokyo International Airport (nicknamed Edowanzu). They wish to fly higher than what is permitted by aviation laws.

Haru is a cheerful, honest, polite and hardworking girl who always wanted to become a pilot. Following her dream, she went overseas after graduating from high school and earned her pilot license after two years in an aviation school in San Diego. She applied to become a co-pilot and got an interview with the Kubo Air Transport Agency. There she met Katsura Keima, the test pilot who had broken the impenetrable barrier in Project Ikaros five years ago.

name: 100 Hidden Capybaras
description: It is a hidden object game with hand-drawn graphics. Find one by one 100 unique capybaras in different, colorful settings while listening to calm music. Find, click, find another one, and enjoy the painted picture.

name: Good-Bye to Youtopia
description: A work of metafiction with a simplistic pixel style. Travel to the depths of the world, battling fears along the way. Say goodbye to utopia, to become human once more, even if you're the only one.

name: Aquatic Store Simulator
description: Dive into the vibrant world of aquatic retail with Aquatic Store Simulator! Take on the challenge of managing your very own underwater-themed supermarket, blending business management with the beauty of aquatic life. Stock shelves with exotic fish, decorations, set prices, take payments and maintain aquariums.

name: Spellchanted 2D Hidden Object Puzzle Adveture Tile-Matching
description: Enter a magical world filled with legendary Fairy Tale characters. Become the greatest wizard. Help a young witch break an evil curse and save the Fairy Tale kingdoms!

name: Paradise
description:
PARADISE is built with advanced AI-driven technologies. The game features a living, breathing world where traffic patterns, pedestrian behavior, and daily activities mimic real-life.

Infrastructure & Nature: From ocean to city bustling with unique locations such as police station, banks, airport and stores, each offering a variety of activities.

AI Trafic: Realistic driving behaviors, where vehicles adhere to traffic laws, get into accidents and respond dynamically to player interactions.

Dynamic activities: Dive into activities from racing to shooting. Work jobs, complete missions, and buy cars, clothes, and property to enrich your game life.

name: Maintenance Required
description: It's your job to check up on an "edutainment" game that was reported to be having some issues. Collect items, catch and battle monsters, and work through puzzles. Just be careful, though, because you never know what may be lurking around the corner.

name: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console
description: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console is an LCD Tetris clone based on the Sanrio character Kuromi.

name: My Lego Network
description: My LEGO Network (or MLN for short) was a Flash and ASP.NET-based social networking site built specifically for children by the LEGO Group. It integrates standard social networking with a gaming function, where players can advance through the Ranks and exchange virtual prizes. The game also allows interactions with other players and computer-controlled Networkers through pre-written mail messages and integrates with the showcasing systems of LEGO.com.

name: Jupiter Hell Classic
description: Jupiter Hell Classic is the demake of a remake of a roguelike unmake of a famous 1993 FPS shooter. Rip and Tear!

name: A Very Splendid Otome Game
description: Please help yourselves to the splendiferous SPLENDIDEST OTOGE. To summarize the game, it's about falling in love with a cake. A very splendid cake. The heroine's name is randomized or optionally set by the player.

name: Assembloids 2600
description:
Assembloids 2600 is a fast-paced reaction puzzle game in just 4K for the Atari 2600. Author Martin Wendt restricted himself to 4K for this project, since he considers this limit to be working within the original spirit of the machine. It is quite challenging to create a polished, enjoyable game within 4K of space!

Upon starting a game, your screen shows five windows. There is one central window and one each in the four neighboring sides. A quarter of a face in a particular color is displayed in the central window and you can place it by moving the joystick up, right, down, or left if the corresponding tile is still empty - if the tile is not empty, you'll lose one of your precious lives. While you are making the decision where to move the face piece, the timer bar decreases faster and faster.

Once a full face is complete, the windows are cleared again and you are awarded points. The number of points depends on the matching of colors for your completed face. A full face of the same color gains you 300 points. Having three face parts of the same color results in 100 points. If only two parts are of equal color, you'll receive 40 points, and a fully mixed face is only worth a mere 10 points. In case you are able to clear ALL the windows, a whopping extra 500 points and an extra life are added as well!

Assembloids 2600 is based on Assembloids 2013 which Martin coded for the Commodore 64. Assembloids 2013 itself is a port of the Flash game "Quartet" by Photon Storm.

name: Life is Feudal: Arden
description: Life is Feudal: Arden is a new, free-to-play MMO set in a brutal medieval world. Challenge fellow feudal lords and ladies, and embark on a journey to conquer uncharted lands. Explore a meticulously hand-crafted map designed to cater to PvP enthusiasts, PvE adventurers, and even those who enjoy the thrill of PvPvE. Fight epic battles, forge alliances, master various professions, trade goods, craft unique items, and build thriving cities or impregnable fortresses. You are the sole driving force for your success!

name: You Have My Support
description: Brought to you by the Lost Ether Crew, You Have My Support is a small collection of 3 unique maps based around slight texture limitations except for anything with a "SUP" prefix. ﻿

name: Elements and Build
description: Form your own genre with skills in different elements, use building rewards to build your own unique maze in randomly generated levels, and fight to survive waves of monsters to win

name: Gator Brigade
description: A game by Oddfellows Software that was formerly know as "Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues". Not much is public about it and the developers are currently on hiatus so its development is currently up in the air.

name: Red Flood
description: Red Flood is a mod for Hearts of Iron IV set in an alternate timeline where nobody won World War I.

name: Leapo Faith
description: Play as LEAPO FAITH, and climb the tower by running, jumping, sliding, and swinging to find out what lies above.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Oswald
description: This additional character ‘OSWALD’ is available in 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIV' with this purchase

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Heidern
description: Heidern commands the mercenary unit where Ralf and Clark belong. He fights using a combination of martial arts and self-taught assassination techniques. As a military officer, Heidern remains calm and silent, but can be over protective to his adopted daughter Leona.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Blue Mary
description: This additional character ‘BLUE MARY' is available in 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIV' with this purchase.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: Najd
description: Najd wears the Abaya (traditional Saudi garment) which has extraordinary powers, but remains humble. She lives a double life, a college student during the day, but at night, she turns into a vigilante to protect her fellow citizens from evil.

name: Call of Elyndra
description:
CALL OF ELYNDRA, where farming meets adventure! Grow crops, battle monsters in real-time combat, upgrade your village and solve ancient quests across five epic realms.

Play as you want--cozy or action-driven. In Elyndra, farming meets fantasy!

name: Fart Game
description: In this hilarious and challenging game, it's all about holding in your fart until the perfect moment! Time and manage your farts wisely, because the more you let slip, the more aware your colleagues become.

name: Dreadway
description: A co-op horror about surviving a nuclear apocalypse as a small group of people on a train, scavenging for various scrap to upgrade the train.

name: Viewpoint
description: A Port of Viewpoint for the PSX.

name: Danchi Days
description: Laugh, cry, and feel awe in this cute adventure game about inviting characters to a Japanese summer festival! Surf the internet to learn their quirks and desires, then use your senses to uncover the unseen wonders of a Y2K, GBA-inspired world.

name: Nightmare House: The Original Mod
description:
Enter the haunting world of Nightmare House. This is the definitive edition of the highly acclaimed horror classic "Nightmare House 2".
Initially released in 2010 as a Source mod for Half-Life 2, the Nightmare House series captivated players with its intense atmosphere and gripping gameplay.

Wake up, it’s time for the real nightmare to begin. Make your way through a terrorizing house, uncover the secrets of a haunted hospital, fight through hordes of the undead, and try to escape Nightmare House.

name: Missing
description:
Missing is a short horror puzzle game in a PSX style.

Your daughter has gone missing. She isn’t returning any of your calls, which is unlike Sarah. Unfortunately, the police feel that she hasn’t been missing long enough to file it as a missing person’s report. Taking matters into your own hands, you realise the location of her phone is still on and, wasting no time, drive down to the location to find out what happened to Sarah.

name: Super Mario Bros. SNES Days 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. SNES Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Paperhead Ep. 0
description: In this cute cardboard world, something went horribly wrong... You wake up in a prison cell. A strange voice calls to you from the depths of dark corridors covered in runic symbols and blood. Reload your trusty shotgun and find out... WHY WOULD CARDBOARD... BLEED?

name: Ark's Wonder Dungeon
description: Explore looping halls, chat around the campfire with dungeoneering misfits, and learn to make the most of each turn in this JRPG dungeon crawler!

name: LEGO Horizon Adventure: Shield Weaver Outfit
description: Sin descripción

name: Plastic Trick
description: “Plastic Trick” is a choice-driven, visual novel where you play as a shopaholic named Serena - who's having a delulu romance with plastic mannequins that have come to life and are fighting for your kiss.

name: 100 Waiting Cats: Extra Content
description:
By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Waiting Cats.
Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: My Raising Diary
description:
At a particular research establishment, a study has been taking place in order to create a synthetic life form that will have more superior abilities than a human. The study had finally yielded results, but...

The protagonist who is working there ends up being forced by the other researchers on the same team as her to raise the synthetic life form.

Since she was young, she has been called a genius, and has no memories of being treated like a child, so even though it's a study, the protagonist, who hasn't really known a parent's love, feels uneasy about raising a child...

name: In Search of the Golden Crops
description: In Search of The Golden Crops is a short game about plant and harvest, use cards, sell your crops, complete tasks on board, upgrade your farm and collect all Golden Crops

name: Genshin Impact: Tapestry of Spirit and Flame
description:
Version 5.2 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Chasca and Ororon
• New areas: Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan
• New main story quest: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Interlude
• New Tribal Chronicles quests for the Flower-Feather Clan and the Masters of the Night-Wind
• New main event: Itkomi Spiritseeking Scrolls
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: The Memory Thieves
description: Immerse yourself in a unique cooperative multiplayer game for 1 to 4 players. Explore the graveyard of Ravenwood, pass through mysterious portals, and steal as much treasure as possible while avoiding the dangers.

name: Warp Cinema
description: Warp Cinema is a bite-size text-parser adventure game made for Adventure Jam 2023 and takes about 10-15 minutes to play through.

name: Solitaire Grand Harvest
description: Play Solitaire Grand Harvest and get a sweet 10,000 coins welcome bonus! Play this fun, free TriPeaks Solitaire game! Endless fun solitaire games & a solitaire farm that's just waiting for you to build it!

name: Persona 5 Pocket Edition
description: A demake of Persona 5 for the Game Boy.

name: Noddy's Big Adventure
description: Noddy's Big Adventure is an edutainment game aimed at children aged 3-7 years. The game features characters from Enid Blyton's Noddy books and TV series. There are seven mini-games within the game. These are a memory game (Tricky Trees), a reading game (Bert's Scrapbook), several matching games (Can You Find Me? and Noddy's Kitchen), a math game (Noddy's Scales), a sorting game (Beach sorter) and Picnic Attack, which is not intended to be educational, where the player squirts water at crabs to keep them away from the food. The games are linked together via a world map where the player can drive Noddy's car from one activity to another, as well as picking up and dropping off passengers (which serves no purpose in the game).

name: Under Defeat
description:
Set in an alternative history where all-out war has erupted, development of this new release falls into the capable hands of City Connection, under supervision by Takehiro Eda and Zerodiv Fukushima Factory, well known in the shooter community for their high-quality ports of classic games.

A popular arcade shooter from G.rev, Under Defeat originally released in 2005 and attracted a legion of fans thanks to its high-octane gameplay, as one or two players assume control of a heavily armed helicopter, taking on a non-stop assault of fighters, played across a semi-isometric playfield, with the unique ability to tilt shots left or right when attacking your enemy. Renowned for its explosive 3D graphics and high intensity gameplay, Under Defeat features no less than three game modes offering high levels of replayability, all of which have been integrated under supervision of G.rev.

Arcade Mode faithfully replicates the original arcade experience, with a 4:3 ratio and a pseudo vertical screen. New Order Mode adapts the game for modern displays, transforming the adrenaline packed shooting action to widescreen 16:9 ratio, and New Order Mode+ brings a host of additional elements to the game, not least being a “WARNING GAUGE,” which adds a risk/reward mechanic to assist the player as they shoot, bomb and swerve through the hordes of enemy invaders.

In addition, Under Defeat comes complete with an incredible soundtrack, newly boosted by video game music veteran, Shinji Hosoe (Ridge Racer series, Tekken series, etc.) and his company, Super Sweep.

name: Mayo Mayo
description: Discover Mayo Mayo, a Match-4 game where strategy and agility are key. Chain clever combos, solve captivating puzzles, and break records. Challenge your friends or improve your skills solo in this competitive adventure full of surprises.

name: Puckdoku
description:
The original hockey doku game.

Choose a player in the designated cell, ensuring they match the specified row and column criteria. Players have 9 guesses to complete the square in full. New games are available every day.

name: Patience
description: PATIENCE is a puzzle game that generates random, solvable puzzles based off of some complex rules. It's shamelessly inspired from a concept featured in a hit 2015 indie game.

name: Ratman!
description: Sin descripción

name: Going Down Turbo
description: Going Down Turbo was created for the 10th anniversary and is not intended to replace the original megawad. Every map has some tweaking, adjusting and in some cases completely overhauling the gameplay to improve the flow and generally make it faster and more fun. Difficulty has been rebalanced to make it more forgiving for new players, while old players can go a bit more rambo if they feel like it.

name: I'd Kiss That Fish
description: This is a fish dress up game in which you select clothes/ accessories to dress up your fish! It is a casual single player 2D sandbox experience with cute stylized graphics.

name: Mancala Snails
description: Mancala Snails is a Flash game by RocketSnail based on the Mancala board game, which was later incorporated into Club Penguin.

name: Giant Rush
description: Giant Rush is an action packed hyper casual fight game with giants. deadly arena and monster duels. Jump on board, run through the obstacle track, merge, grow stronger and battle against giant monsters.

name: Love Is...
description: "Love is..." is a hidden picture game with emotional art by artist 'Puuung'. It is a healing game that can relieve stress and excitement like relaxation, and enjoy the charming emotional coloring game that spreads at your fingertips.

name: Seishoku ni Watashi wo
description: Momen, who guides the townspeople from a ruined church, is one day bitten by the vampire Wata. They are connected by a curse that binds them and prevents Wata from drinking blood from anyone else. Wata takes care of Momen, and the two work to break the curse.

name: Street Fighter II
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter II
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sensational December Machine
description: The Sensational December Machine is a short interactive story about an inventor and her unusual new creation. It features hand-drawn art and text, and dynamic music, which evolves with the story. It was created over three weeks, in December 2014.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2: World Peace Day Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda Costume Pack
description:
DISCOVER A NEW GALAXY
Star charts at the ready, Sack Gang.

Create your own wild missions through the far reaches of the galaxy by dressing up your LBP pals as characters from the thrilling RPG adventure, Mass Effect Andromeda.

This pack features costumes of:
• N7 Armor: Sackboy charges into battle in the iconic Pathfinder threads.
• Drack: Enemies freeze in fear at the sight of Big Toggle dressed as the Krogan warrior.
• Initiative Armor: Only the bravest recruits are chosen for daring missions - including Little Toggle.
• Wraith: A fierce creature faithful to the mysterious Kett alien race. OddSock needs to perfect his growling.
• Poc: Swoop can spy on your enemies from above dressed as a covert drone.

name: Street Fighter V: Alex
description: Sin descripción

name: Awaria
description: Welcome to the tunnel maintenance crew. If the generators fail, it's your job to fix them. Check what's wrong, craft all the needed parts and deliver them. It's simple. Just stay clear of anything that randomly cracks bolts of electricity, spews fire, throws sharp pieces of scrap at high-velocity or radiates with ominous green light.

name: Time Soul
description: TIME SOUL is a souls-like action-platformer with generative unique worlds, platforms and planets. Defeat time guardians, collect clocks and shards, and stop the time before facing the Time Lord. Randomized bosses, mobs, 300+items, 50+weapons and spells, Conquer the galaxy in 60 minutes!

name: Trolddom
description: Old-school 2D MMORPG.

name: Isekai Saga: Awaken
description: In the Isekai world, adventure never stops! Place upgrades, heroes break through levels! Flexible strategies, multiple gameplay, simple operations, rich experience!

name: Weldiver
description:
Each mission in Weldiver is a journey into the ocean’s depths, where players undertake the challenging work of maintaining offshore structures, performing emergency repairs, and replacing seabed infrastructure like optical cables, pipelines, and power lines.

Forty times more likely to die than the average worker... and every time I go down, the pressure waits. Trying to make me implode, drown, freeze... or worse.

name: Timebound
description: An exploration puzzle metroidbrainia set in mystical ruins. Solve timeloop puzzles, explore the open world, learn the rules and break them.

name: Forsaken
description: Forsaken is a 10-level minimod reimagining the "Lost Episodes" for Spear of Destiny, celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2024. Imagine if the original creators of Return to Danger had gone all out, transforming the EXE, palette, music, and sounds into a fully immersive experience. Now you can find out! The Nazis have hidden the Spear of Destiny in a remote Moravian castle high in the mountains, and it's up to the fearless B.J. Blazkowicz to infiltrate the fortress and reclaim it. It's in SDL

name: Chrysalis
description: Experience fast-paced, sci-fi action in a top-down shooter where an outbreak of paranormal creatures turns a high-tech laboratory into a battleground. Fight your way through intense encounters using advanced weaponry and strategic movement. Powered by a custom game engine, this adventure combines chaotic combat with stunning visuals for an immersive experience.

name: The Laser Games
description: The Laser Games is a casual/competitive shooter, embracing the thrill and experience from real laser tag. Jump in with friends, strangers, or alone, and explore the various maps and challenges as you zap your way to the top! Play it your way- unlock and equip customizations, or contribute to the workshop with your own maps and gametypes!

name: PiMon
description: PiMon are virtual pets that live right on your PC! Take care of your PiMon while you do your daily tasks. Train them, update them into new forms, raise PiMon together or battle with your friends. Or do none of that and raise your PiMon your way! Welcome Admin, what kind of PiMon will you raise?

name: Late Night Confessional
description:
Late Night Confessional is a multi protagonist photography-minigame-visual novel about a long time coming break-up and the fast approaching end of the world.

God appeared dead in the sky and the pieces wont stop falling down to Earth. Everyone pretends they don't see it coming. The world moves on as normal. Mary Baker still has to work her low wage fast food job. Her biggest problem right now? She wants to break up with her girlfriend.

name: Gladiators Battle
description:
Step into Gladiators Battle, a captivating free-to-play online game that immerses you in the glory and grit of Ancient Rome’s famed arenas. Challenge yourself across 21 diverse mini-games, covering Combat, Puzzles, and Gambling. Each mini-game is crafted to test your strategy, skill, and luck, offering unique paths to honor and reward. From rigorous training to high-stakes tournaments and games of chance, each victory takes you one step closer to greatness!

Discover our extensive History section, filled with engaging insights into the life of gladiators, Roman warfare, and ancient traditions. With detailed lore spread across multiple pages, and a comprehensive glossary to deepen your understanding, you’ll be part of a living history as you explore and compete.

Earn Gold through each mini-game, then head to the Marketplace to strengthen your gladiator with powerful gear and exclusive items. Buy, sell, and trade your way to the top—without spending a single dime! Gladiators Battle is completely free-to-play, with no microtransactions, ensuring a pure and competitive experience. Use your gold wisely to boost your strength, challenge others, and rise to dominance, creating your own legend.

Join Guilds, forge alliances, and battle players and AI alike as you compete for glory. With unmatched strategic depth and an immersive historical experience, Gladiators Battle is not just a game—it’s an epic journey through ancient times where your legend awaits.

name: Mushroom Oasis
description:
Your beloved cat has been missing for a few days. You suspect she's run off into the woods across the street, a bad habit she does whenever she manages to get a paw out the door behind your back. The forest wasn't known to be dangerous, quite peaceful in fact, but her being an indoor pet has you worried regardless.

Though being an indoor person yourself, you wound up wandering far deeper than you intended. Lucky for you a kind (but odd-looking) stranger stumbled upon you before anything bad happened.

...Let's hope he only has good intentions in bringing you home.

name: Pacman Worlds
description: Sin descripción

name: Hexa Sort
description:
Hexa Sort offers a delightful blend of puzzle challenges, strategic matching, and satisfying merging experience. Engage your mind with stimulating brain games that involve clever puzzle solving and logical maneuvers, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a mental workout.

Hexa Sort introduces a unique twist to the classic sort puzzle concept, inviting players to explore the art of shuffling and organizing hexagon tile stacks. With the goal of achieving satisfying color matches, players can immerse themselves in the thrill of color switch and enjoy the calming effects of merging tiles. Each level presents challenges to meet collection goals, providing a perfect balance of excitement and stress relief for those who prefer relaxing games.

The game's aesthetics boast a visually pleasing palette with gradients, creating a serene and zen environment for players to enjoy. Dive into the world of color games, color sorting, and free therapy through the game's minimalistic design. The inclusion of 3D graphics adds an extra layer of immersion, allowing players to view the board from various angles while engaging in the satisfying processes of stacking and merging tiles.

Hexa Sort is not merely a game; it's a captivating brain teaser that demands smart thinking. As players progress through levels, they'll find the gameplay to be both addicting and calming, striking the perfect balance between challenge and relaxation. Put your skills to the test with tasks involving sorting, stacking, and merging hexa tiles, witnessing the rewarding results of your efforts.

Unlock new levels to keep your mind sharp, reveling in the therapeutic experience of this captivating color puzzle game. The game caters to enthusiasts of color fill 3D and challenges based on hexagon structures. Invite friends to join the excitement, compete for high scores, and share the joy of engaging in fun puzzle games.

name: Kusodeka Bayashi
description: Kusodeka Bayashi is a first-person horror comedy game. It has one ending, and the time to complete this game is about 2 hours.

name: Lucky Fighter II
description: Doujin fighting game based on the popular manga and anime "Lucky Star".

name: Tokyo Revengers: Last Mission
description: Action RPG based on the Tokyo Revengers series. Relive the main story events of Tokyo Revengers by leaping back-and-forth through time to get revenge against the worst possible future.

name: Animal Striker 2
description: Animal Striker 2 is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS where animals fight in intense arenas. Pick up magical weapons with unique projectiles, customize your loadout, and compete in team-based or free-for-all modes. Unleash your power and dominate the battlefield!

name: Street Fighter V: Skies of Honor
description: Sin descripción

name: K-Jo Chases the Cheese
description: The slight mouse K-Jo, accustomed to the tranquility of the countryside, found himself in trouble when trying to fight for food in the city. He needs your help to escape the mousetraps, collect cheeses, score points and leave each room before time runs out, and so go through the 60 existing levels.

name: Razor's Edge
description:
Sarah Stone, a renowned reporter and expert fighter, decides to rescue her sister kidnapped by a gang of criminals that have taken over the city. On her journey she will encounter several enemies ready to stop her from completing the mission.
Sarah knows the dangers, her life is on a razor's edge...

name: K-Jo Chases the Cheese
description: The slight mouse K-Jo, accustomed to the tranquility of the countryside, found himself in trouble when trying to fight for food in the city. He needs your help to escape the mousetraps, collect cheeses, score points and leave each room before time runs out, and so go through the 120 existing levels.

name: Flippets
description:
In a distant land, concealed within the mystical forests of the north, there exists a magical place known as the Mushroom Grove. In this enchanted realm, dwell the adorable Flippets, small green beings who serve as the guardians of the forest's secrets. One day, the Flippets decided to create an intriguing game to test their skills against each other.

This game involved a special formation where all the Flippets stood aligned, except for one who turned away from the others. This small challenge became a fun tradition among the Flippets, known as "Find Me."

The player takes on the role of a fearless Flippet explorer, embarking on an exciting journey to locate the Flippet who chose to turn their back to the group. Do you have the dexterity and keen insight required to find the intrepid Flippet? The Mushroom Grove awaits you, filled with mysteries and unparalleled fun.

name: La Sfida Della Sfinge
description: This is a collection of puzzles and crosswords made by Aenigmatica, a brand of La Settimana Enigmistica, one of the first and most important magazines in Italy. This game takes place in ancient egypt inside a pyramid. The player has to solve some crosswords and puzzles to advance to the next level.

description:
An assistant robot boots up to find their mission's researcher.

Just one of the stories in the Lorn's Lure Megastructure.

name: Lidraughts
description: Play international draughts (on a 10X10 board), or draughts variants on an 8x8 board, online and offline, against other players and against the computer. Built for the love of draughts, this app is open source and free for all.

name: Lishogi
description: Lishogi is a free online shogi game server focused on realtime gameplay and ease of use.
